K12D0828_H0792:51b-7: de las de bzhin de mi 'byung //
K12D0828_H0792:51b-8: mchog tu gsang ba'i chos nyid ni //
K12D0828_H0792:51b-9: rna dbang gzhan las thos mi 'gyur //
K12D0828_H0792:51b-10: de bzhin lce yi dbang pos kyang //
K12D0828_H0792:51b-11: de la brjod du rdul tsam med //
K12D0828_H0792:51b-12: 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal byang chub sems //
K12D0828_H0792:51b-13: kun tu chub pas rnam par grol //
K12D0828_H0792:51b-14: de la bskyod pa med bzhin du //
K12D0828_H0792:51b-15: nam mkha'i mtha' ltar mnyam par gnas //
K12D0828_H0792:51b-16: khyad par cir yang mtshungs pa la //
K12D0828_H0792:51b-17: las so zhes ni rnam par brtags //
K12D0828_H0792:51b-18: ci ste las kyi dbang 'gyur na //
K12D0828_H0792:51b-19: rang 'byung ye shes yod ma yin //
K12D0828_H0792:51b-20: rgyu nyid rdo rje rkyen dang 'dra //
K12D0828_H0792:51b-21: ma skyes pas na 'jig pa med //
K12D0828_H0792:51b-22: gdod nas snying po byang chub la //
K12D0828_H0792:51b-23: btsal ba'i bsam pas dbyings mi bskyod //
K12D0828_H0792:51b-24: yon tan chen po'i bsam gtan ni; ;bsam gtan nyid pas bsam du med //
K12D0828_H0792:51b-25: ma bsam ma sbyangs chos bzhin du //
K12D0828_H0792:51b-26: rnam rtog nyid las ye shes skyes //
K12D0828_H0792:51b-27: phra ba'i sgo mor ming brtags te //
K12D0828_H0792:51b-28: sems kyi dben pa lam tshol zhing //
K12D0828_H0792:51b-29: dgon pa'i rgyud du dben 'dzin cing //
K12D0828_H0792:51b-30: brtags na rnam par rtog 'gyur bsgom //
K12D0828_H0792:51b-31: rgyu dang 'bras bur ming btags te //
K12D0828_H0792:52a-0: dge sdig gnyis ka rnam par @52a *//
K12D0828_H0792:52a-2: blang dor phrod pa mchog tu bskyed //
K12D0828_H0792:52a-3: chags dang ma chags tshig gi lam //
K12D0828_H0792:52a-4: dbu ma bzhin te brag cha 'dra; ;bde dang sdug bsngal rgyu mthun zhes //
K12D0828_H0792:52a-5: 'gro ba'i mgon po sems dpas gsungs //
K12D0828_H0792:52a-6: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug kyang //
K12D0828_H0792:52a-7: byang chub chen po'i lam las byung //
K12D0828_H0792:52a-8: kun spyod yon tan rnam lnga yang //
K12D0828_H0792:52a-9: chos nyid dbyings kyi rgyan zhes gsungs //
K12D0828_H0792:52a-10: nam mkha' rtog pa skye med cing //
K12D0828_H0792:52a-11: rtog pa de nyid nam mkha' 'dra //
K12D0828_H0792:52a-12: mi chags nam mkha'i sngo ba las //
K12D0828_H0792:52a-13: rang don chen po nam mkha' 'byung //
K12D0828_H0792:52a-14: rtog med mnyam nyid chos kyi sku //
K12D0828_H0792:52a-15: gzung bas mi zin chu zla 'dra //
K12D0828_H0792:52a-16: kun tu bzang po'i rol pa yis //
K12D0828_H0792:52a-17: a'a li k'a li zab tu bstan //
K12D0828_H0792:52a-18: 'di ni aa dang mdzes pa'i ta //
K12D0828_H0792:52a-19: pa dang yan lag spros pa bzhin //
K12D0828_H0792:52a-20: 'jig rten yongs kyi spyod yul la //
K12D0828_H0792:52a-21: sangs rgyas gsung gi zab mo 'byung //
K12D0828_H0792:52a-22: ae ma'o sangs rgyas spyod yul 'di //
K12D0828_H0792:52a-23: btsal bas rnyed pa'i gnas med de //
K12D0828_H0792:52a-24: drug gi chos bzhin yul med pas //
K12D0828_H0792:52a-25: mdongs pas nam mkha' bsnyabs pa bzhin //
K12D0828_H0792:52a-26: gong nas gong du tshangs pa'i lam //
K12D0828_H0792:52a-27: bya bral chos dang mthun pa min //
K12D0828_H0792:52a-28: ci ste lam la bgrod 'gyur na //
K12D0828_H0792:52a-29: nam mkha'i mtha' bzhin thob pa med //
K12D0828_H0792:52a-30: de ltar de bzhin de yi phyir //
K12D0828_H0792:52b-0: de la de bstan de yang @52b thob; ;de ni snying po de bas na //
K12D0828_H0792:52b-1: de las de 'byung ngo mtshar che //
K12D0828_H0792:52b-2: sngon gyi de dang da ltar de //
K12D0828_H0792:52b-3: de bzhin de yi gnas su che //
K12D0828_H0792:52b-4: de ltar de yi lam 'dra ba //
K12D0828_H0792:52b-5: de ni de yi rang bzhin no //
K12D0828_H0792:52b-6: de dang 'dra ba yongs kyi lam //
K12D0828_H0792:52b-7: zla ba las byung rten dang bcas //
K12D0828_H0792:52b-8: kun gyi mnyam nyid yin pa la //
K12D0828_H0792:52b-9: phyogs su bltas pas grub pa med //
K12D0828_H0792:52b-10: da ltar bde dang phyi mar bde //
K12D0828_H0792:52b-11: mngon sum pa dang rgyab nas 'byung //
K12D0828_H0792:52b-12: de yang rnam pa'i skyon yin pas //
K12D0828_H0792:52b-13: de la brten par mi bya'o //
K12D0828_H0792:52b-14: dus gsum gcig ste khyad par med //
K12D0828_H0792:52b-15: sngon med phyis med gdod nas 'byung //
K12D0828_H0792:52b-16: chos skus khyab pas gcig pa'i phyir //
K12D0828_H0792:52b-17: che ba'i chen po rang bzhin gnas //
K12D0828_H0792:52b-18: srid pa gsum na sbyor ba yang //
K12D0828_H0792:52b-19: ming tsam sgyu mar snang ba ste //
K12D0828_H0792:52b-20: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i gnas chen yang //
K12D0828_H0792:52b-21: sgyu ma sbyong ba'i bsti gnas yin //
K12D0828_H0792:52b-22: rnam spyod dus la ltos pa rnams //
K12D0828_H0792:52b-24: ma bral smon pa spyod pas na //
K12D0828_H0792:52b-25: stong pa'i mtshan nyid gsungs pa bzhin //
K12D0828_H0792:52b-26: gcig ste rnam pa yongs kyis med //
K12D0828_H0792:52b-27: rnal 'byor nam mkha'i bya lam gnas //
K12D0828_H0792:52b-28: ma byung ma skyes snying po la //
K12D0828_H0792:52b-29: sgros btags chos kun ga la yod //
K12D0828_H0792:52b-30: phyi nang gnyis ka phyi nyid nang; ;zab mo cha shas rtogs yul med //
K12D0828_H0792:52b-31: srid pa ming tsam log pa'i stobs //
K12D0828_H0792:52b-32: de bas ting 'dzin mnyam dang bral //
K12D0828_H0792:52b-33: de la tha tshig phyi dang nang //
K12D0828_H0792:53a-3: tha tshig ming du btags pa med //
K12D0828_H0792:53a-4: mi g-yo ba ni sku yi rgya //
K12D0828_H0792:53a-5: mi bskyod pas ni ye shes te //
K12D0828_H0792:53a-6: mi len pa ni bdag med cing //
K12D0828_H0792:53a-7: mi 'dor tshig bral mnyam nyid do //
K12D0828_H0792:53a-8: gang dang gang gi gang du yang //
K12D0828_H0792:53a-9: kun 'khol kun spyod bdag las byung //
K12D0828_H0792:53a-10: 'di la skyes pa bud med ces //
K12D0828_H0792:53a-11: mnyam pa'i rgyal pos yong ma gsungs //
K12D0828_H0792:53a-12: 'di la brtul zhugs drag shul gyis //
K12D0828_H0792:53a-13: gnas su bya ba'i ming med de //
K12D0828_H0792:53a-14: aa dang par ni rnam ldan na //
K12D0828_H0792:53a-16: rang bzhin gcig tu ma nges pas //
K12D0828_H0792:53a-17: ji ltar bltas pa de ltar snang //
K12D0828_H0792:53a-18: snang 'dod rtsol sems bde ba yang //
K12D0828_H0792:53a-19: de ni de sgrib skyon chen yin //
K12D0828_H0792:53a-20: byang chub yan lag kun gyi sgo //
K12D0828_H0792:53a-21: cha lugs bsgoms pas chu zla bzhin //
K12D0828_H0792:53a-23: bsgoms pas byis pa'i spyod yul bzhin //
K12D0828_H0792:53a-24: dkyil 'khor khro gnyer cha lugs kyis //
K12D0828_H0792:53a-25: khro bdag chen po'i lus bzung nas //
K12D0828_H0792:53a-26: yi ge mngon du byung na yang //
K12D0828_H0792:53a-27: zhi bde nyid mthong ba min //
K12D0828_H0792:53a-28: nyon mongs pa yi dbang gis na //
K12D0828_H0792:53a-29: ta la'i mgo bo bcad pa dang //
K12D0828_H0792:53a-30: sa bon me yis bsregs pa dang //
K12D0828_H0792:53a-31: de yi dbang du mi 'gyur ston //
K12D0828_H0792:53a-32: rnam grangs brgya stong phrag yas pa //
K12D0828_H0792:53a-33: gang ltar spyad kyang me tog skye //
K12D0828_H0792:53b-0: mtshan ma med pa'i dbang @53b gis ni //
K12D0828_H0792:53b-2: gleng bral 'di la gnas pa ni //
K12D0828_H0792:53b-3: rnal 'byor de ni skal ba bzang //
K12D0828_H0792:53b-4: bdag dang gzhan don mi 'byed pas //
K12D0828_H0792:53b-5: sgyu ma lhun grub yul la rol //
K12D0828_H0792:53b-6: lhag ma med pas yongs su rdzogs //
K12D0828_H0792:53b-7: 'gyur ba ma yin drang por gnas //
K12D0828_H0792:53b-8: nam mkha' bzhin te mtha' mnyam zhing //
K12D0828_H0792:53b-9: gzhan la ltos 'gyur chos ma yin //
K12D0828_H0792:53b-10: lhun gyis grub pa'i bde chen de //
K12D0828_H0792:53b-11: mtshungs pa med pa'i ye shes kyis //
K12D0828_H0792:53b-12: rang gi mthu yi rig pa las //
K12D0828_H0792:53b-14: sla zhing dka' la sla phyir dka'//
K12D0828_H0792:53b-15: mngon sum mi gnas kun tu khyab //
K12D0828_H0792:53b-16: ming tsam 'di zhes bstan par ni //
K12D0828_H0792:53b-17: rdo rje sems dpas mtshon du med //
K12D0828_H0792:53b-18: ngo mtshar rmad byung rol pa 'di //
K12D0828_H0792:53b-19: bya bral nam mkha' bzhin du gnas //
K12D0828_H0792:53b-20: cir yang mi dmigs gti mug las //
K12D0828_H0792:53b-21: de ma thag tu rang las byung //
K12D0828_H0792:53b-22: 'di ni thams cad mtshungs pa'i lam //
K12D0828_H0792:53b-23: 'gro ba kun gyi rang bzhin gnas //
K12D0828_H0792:53b-24: bus pas bslad pas 'khrul pa'i phyir //
K12D0828_H0792:53b-25: sman nyid sman pa tshol ba bzhin //
K12D0828_H0792:53b-26: go ba'i yul na bde ba che //
K12D0828_H0792:53b-30: ma nges 'ja' tshon kha dog las //
K12D0828_H0792:53b-31: rigs kyi khyad par mngon par snang //
K12D0828_H0792:53b-32: de bzhin g-yo rdul mi g-yo ba //
K12D0828_H0792:53b-33: 'byung ba lnga bas gtso chen yin //
K12D0828_H0792:54a-2: tha snyad ming la mi gnas te //
K12D0828_H0792:54a-3: skye 'gag med par rnam brtags shing //
K12D0828_H0792:54a-4: de nyid dus gsum chen por sbyor //
K12D0828_H0792:54a-5: mnyam pas rim par bkod pa med //
K12D0828_H0792:54a-6: gcig pas phyogs bcu bsod dang bral //
K12D0828_H0792:54a-7: tshogs kyi rgyan rnams bkram pa yang //
K12D0828_H0792:54a-8: rang bzhin gnas pas 'grim pa med //
K12D0828_H0792:54a-9: lhun gyis gnas pas mi bsngo zhing; ;gdod nas dag pas bdud rtsi yin //
K12D0828_H0792:54a-10: 'du mched bcu gnyis khyad par du //
K12D0828_H0792:54a-11: lhag pa'i bsam pas bzung ba med //
K12D0828_H0792:54a-12: yid kyis bsam pas yon gdags te //
K12D0828_H0792:54a-13: bltas pas tshogs ni bkram pa'o //
K12D0828_H0792:54a-14: mthong bar gyur pas dngos grub la //
K12D0828_H0792:54a-15: de nyid mnyam bzhag rdzogs pa'o //
K12D0828_H0792:54a-16: yud tsam bzung bas sbyor ba yin //
K12D0828_H0792:54a-17: dga' bar gyur pas dam tshig ste; ;thabs kyis gar thabs bskyod pa yis //
K12D0828_H0792:54a-18: gnyis med sbyor ba phul ba yin //
K12D0828_H0792:54a-19: mi bzung gtong bas gtong ma yin //
K12D0828_H0792:54a-20: bya ba med pa'i las rnams te //
K12D0828_H0792:54a-21: mi rtog ye shes bgegs bsal nas //
K12D0828_H0792:54a-22: ma gsungs mnyam gzhag sngags tshig go /
K12D0828_H0792:54a-23: bla ma mchod dang gtong ba dang //
K12D0828_H0792:54a-24: de bzhin bsod nams thams cad kyang //
K12D0828_H0792:54a-25: ma chags mi g-yo'i stobs med na; ;byas na 'ching ba chen por 'gyur //
K12D0828_H0792:54a-26: de bas de lung de nyid la //
K12D0828_H0792:54a-27: de la de sbyar sgrib par 'gyur //
K12D0828_H0792:54a-28: de ltar de la de rtog na //
K12D0828_H0792:54a-29: de la de nyid grub pa med //
K12D0828_H0792:54b-0: byang @54b chub kyis sems kun byed rgyal po las /
K12D0828_H0792:54b-1: rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin mi nub pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi le'u ste sum cu pa'o ////
K12D0828_H0792:54b-2: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po
K12D0828_H0792:54b-3: des kun byed kyi rang bzhin bya med rdzogs pa
K12D0828_H0792:54b-5: kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /
K12D0828_H0792:54b-6: sna tshogs rang bzhin mi gnyis kyang //
K12D0828_H0792:54b-7: cha shas nyid du spros dang bral //
K12D0828_H0792:54b-8: ji bzhin pa zhes mi rtog kyang //
K12D0828_H0792:54b-9: rnam par snang mdzad kun tu bzang //
K12D0828_H0792:54b-10: zin pas rtsol ba'i nad spangs te //
K12D0828_H0792:54b-11: lhun gyis gnas pas bzhag pa yin //
K12D0828_H0792:54b-13: byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
K12D0828_H0792:54b-14: rdo rje tshig drug gi le'u ste sum cu gcig pa'o ////
K12D0828_H0792:54b-15: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po
K12D0828_H0792:54b-16: des sems dpa' rdo rje la ma byas don grub
K12D0828_H0792:54b-17: kyi lung nges pa tshig bzhi'i le'u 'di gsungs so
K12D0828_H0792:54b-18: // kye; sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar don rig gis //
K12D0828_H0792:54b-19: ji ltar snang ba de bzhin nyid du gcig /
K12D0828_H0792:54b-20: 'di la su yang 'chos par ma byed cig /
K12D0828_H0792:54b-21: ma bcos mnyam pa'i rgyal po de la ni //
K12D0828_H0792:54b-22: mi rtog chos sku'i dgongs pa de la gnas //
K12D0828_H0792:54b-24: byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
K12D0828_H0792:54b-25: nges pa tshig bzhi'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o ////
K12D0828_H0792:55a-0: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po de nyid las byung ba'i chos @55a *//
K12D0828_H0792:55a-1: nyid de nyid kyi rig pa'i ye shes sems dpa' rdo rje zhes bya ba /
K12D0828_H0792:55a-2: chos thams cad rig par byed pa'i rgyal po rang
K12D0828_H0792:55a-3: 'byung gi ye shes de la nyid kyi rang bzhin
K12D0828_H0792:55a-4: rtogs par dka' ba 'di bstan to //
K12D0828_H0792:55a-6: yid kyi dbang pos sgra rtogs shig /
K12D0828_H0792:55a-7: sgra yis don de rtogs rigs byos //
K12D0828_H0792:55a-8: kun gyi gnas ni chos kyi dbyings yin na //
K12D0828_H0792:55a-9: dbyings kyi sgra don ji ltar rig par byed //
K12D0828_H0792:55a-10: kun gyi lung yul nam mkha'i khams 'di la //
K12D0828_H0792:55a-11: nam mkha'i sgra don ji ltar rig par byed //
K12D0828_H0792:55a-12: mngon du gsal ba 'byung ba lnga yin na //
K12D0828_H0792:55a-13: mngon du snang ba'i don ni ji ltar rig /
K12D0828_H0792:55a-14: de las byung ba'i khams gsum sems can ni //
K12D0828_H0792:55a-15: de yi don ni ji ltar rig par byed //
K12D0828_H0792:55a-16: rig pa'i rgyal pos nyid phyir nga la nyon //
K12D0828_H0792:55a-18: kye; ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po lags //
K12D0828_H0792:55a-19: khyod kyi rang bzhin shin tu rtogs dka' ba //
K12D0828_H0792:55a-20: rnam bzhi bstan pa'i sgra yis bdag gis rtogs //
K12D0828_H0792:55a-21: dbyings kyi sgra yis 'byed pa med par rtogs //
K12D0828_H0792:55a-22: nam mkha'i sgra yis ma bsgribs gsal bar rtogs //
K12D0828_H0792:55a-23: 'byung ba'i sgra yis kun gyi snying por rtogs //
K12D0828_H0792:55a-24: sems can sems kyis sgra don de rig byed //
K12D0828_H0792:55a-25: de rig kun byed shin tu rtogs dka' rig /
K12D0828_H0792:55a-26: kun byed nyid las gzhan zhes bstan pa med //
K12D0828_H0792:55b-0: de nas kun byed rgyal @55b pos rig pa'i rgyal po la slar gsungs pa /
K12D0828_H0792:55b-1: nga yi rang bzhin rtogs dka' 'di rig na //
K12D0828_H0792:55b-2: chos kyi mdo rtsa yan lag kun rig gis //
K12D0828_H0792:55b-3: rig pa'i rgyal po zhes su mtshan yang btags //
K12D0828_H0792:55b-4: kye; byed pa'i rgyal po kun byed byang chub sems //
K12D0828_H0792:55b-5: khyod kyi rang bzhin 'di lta chos nyid 'di //
K12D0828_H0792:55b-6: sems dang ye shes chos nyid rig pa ste //
K12D0828_H0792:55b-7: de yi rang bzhin bdag gis 'di ltar mthong //
K12D0828_H0792:55b-8: sems nyid spros bral sgra ni chos nyid sgra //
K12D0828_H0792:55b-9: sems nyid ma bsgribs sgra ni nam mkha'i khams //
K12D0828_H0792:55b-10: sems nyid ngo bo snying po 'byung ba'i sgra //
K12D0828_H0792:55b-11: rig pa so sor rtog pa sems can sems //
K12D0828_H0792:55b-12: sems kyi rang bzhin las ni gzhan med de //
K12D0828_H0792:55b-13: kun byed rgyal po sems las gzhan med do //
K12D0828_H0792:55b-16: nga yi rang bzhin de rig na //
K12D0828_H0792:55b-17: kun byed nga yi rang bzhin rig pa yin //
K12D0828_H0792:55b-18: nga rig gcig rig kun rig thams cad rig /
K12D0828_H0792:55b-19: sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khyod la ni //
K12D0828_H0792:55b-20: rig pa'i rgyal po zhes su ming btags so //
K12D0828_H0792:55b-21: kye; rig pa'i rgyal pos de ltar rig gyur na //
K12D0828_H0792:55b-22: nga las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyis //
K12D0828_H0792:55b-23: bstan pa'i theg pa rnam pa gsum byung nas //
K12D0828_H0792:55b-24: rgyu las 'bras bu 'dod pa gsum gyis ni //
K12D0828_H0792:55b-25: bya ba'i las ni lta spyod sna tshogs kyis //
K12D0828_H0792:55b-26: 'bras bu gsum ni gang dang gang sgrub pa //
K12D0828_H0792:55b-27: rig pa'i rgyal pos chos de ji ltar rig /
K12D0828_H0792:56a-1: pa'i rgyal pos slar gsungs pa //
K12D0828_H0792:56a-2: kye; kun byed rgyal po khyod las byung ba yi //
K12D0828_H0792:56a-3: sku gsum ston pa khyod kyi ngo bo gsum //

K12D0828_H0792:91b-7: stong phrag gcig na mi rtog mnyam bzod rnyed //
K12D0828_H0792:91b-8: kye; sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khyod nyid kyang //
K12D0828_H0792:91b-9: nga lung ma nor khyod kyis nga ston cig /
K12D0828_H0792:91b-10: kye; sems can lha mi rnams ni shes pa rtsing //
K12D0828_H0792:91b-11: dbang po yul la yengs pa'i rang bzhin gyis //
K12D0828_H0792:91b-12: sems can mi shes gang bstan tshim pa la //
K12D0828_H0792:91b-13: ma nor nges pa'i lung chen ma bstan par //
K12D0828_H0792:91b-14: rgyu 'bras drang lung don dam kun rdzob bstan //
K12D0828_H0792:91b-15: bden brdzun gnyis kyis shes pa de tshim nas //
K12D0828_H0792:91b-16: bskal pa yun ring bden brdzun gnyis la gnas //
K12D0828_H0792:91b-17: de bas dang por rang sems ma nor bstan //
K12D0828_H0792:91b-18: bstan pas ma nor btsal med lam phrad nas //
K12D0828_H0792:91b-19: da lta nyid nas mi rtsol sa la gnas //
K12D0828_H0792:91b-20: btsal du med pa'i lam dang de phrad 'gyur //
K12D0828_H0792:91b-21: ting 'dzin bsgom mi dgos dang de phrad 'gyur //
K12D0828_H0792:91b-22: mi rtsol bde la gnas pa de yis thob //
K12D0828_H0792:91b-23: ma nor nges par rang sems de thob pas //
K12D0828_H0792:91b-24: ma btsal lhun gyis grub pa'i yon tan ni //
K12D0828_H0792:91b-25: sems bskyed mi dgos lam la bgrod mi dgos //
K12D0828_H0792:91b-26: sa la mi sbyong lta ba bsgom mi dgos //
K12D0828_H0792:92a-0: @92a *// sdom pa tshul khrims dam du gnyer mi dgos //
K12D0828_H0792:92a-1: kye; sems dpa' chen po lung ston cig /
K12D0828_H0792:92a-2: 'jig rten mtshan ma'i chos 'di bsgrub pa bzhin //
K12D0828_H0792:92a-3: lus kyi las su bya byed lha mi sgom //
K12D0828_H0792:92a-4: ngag gi las su sngags dang tshig mi brjod //
K12D0828_H0792:92a-5: yid kyi las su ting 'dzin gsal mi dgos //
K12D0828_H0792:92a-7: byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
K12D0828_H0792:92a-8: chos thams cad byang chub kyi sems las med pa'i le'u steng lnga pa'o ////
K12D0828_H0792:92a-9: de nas sems dpa' rdo rje des /
K12D0828_H0792:92a-10: byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po de chos thams cad kyi ngo bo dang /
K12D0828_H0792:92a-11: byed pa po yin par nyid kyi 'khor thams cad la tshig bsgrags pa dang /
K12D0828_H0792:92a-12: rtogs pa phul ba 'di bsgrags so //
K12D0828_H0792:92a-13: kye; ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po lags //
K12D0828_H0792:92a-14: bdag gis khyod kyi rang bzhin rtogs pa ni //
K12D0828_H0792:92a-15: chos rnams thams cad khyod kyi rang bzhin gcig /
K12D0828_H0792:92a-16: chos nyid chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang de //
K12D0828_H0792:92a-17: kun byed rgyal po yin par rab tu grags //
K12D0828_H0792:92a-18: nam mkha'i khams kyi gzhal yas khang 'di yang //
K12D0828_H0792:92a-19: kun byed rgyal po yin par rab tu grags //
K12D0828_H0792:92a-20: skye med chos kyi sku yi ston pa yang //
K12D0828_H0792:92a-21: kun byed rgyal po yin par rab tu grags //
K12D0828_H0792:92a-22: 'dod spyod longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku 'di yang //
K12D0828_H0792:92a-23: kun byed rgyal po yin par rab tu grags //
K12D0828_H0792:92a-24: thugs rje ye shes sprul pa'i sku 'di yang //
K12D0828_H0792:92b-0: kun byed @92b rgyal po yin par rab tu grags //
K12D0828_H0792:92b-1: 'dod pa'i khams kyi 'dod chags khams 'di yang //
K12D0828_H0792:92b-2: kun byed rgyal po yin par rab tu grags //
K12D0828_H0792:92b-3: gzugs kyi khams kyi nga rgyal khams 'di yang; ;kun byed rgyal po yin par rab tu grags //
K12D0828_H0792:92b-4: gzugs med khams kyi yid kyi lus 'di yang //
K12D0828_H0792:92b-5: kun byed rgyal po yin par rab tu grags //
K12D0828_H0792:92b-6: snga rabs 'das pa'i sangs rgyas nyid la gnas pa yang //
K12D0828_H0792:92b-7: kun byed rgyal po yin par rab tu grags //
K12D0828_H0792:92b-8: da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas don mdzad kyang //
K12D0828_H0792:92b-9: kun byed rgyal po yin par rab tu grags //
K12D0828_H0792:92b-10: slad kyis byon pa'i nyid las byung ba yang //
K12D0828_H0792:92b-11: kun byed rgyal po yin par rab tu grags //
K12D0828_H0792:92b-12: rnal 'byor rnam bzhi nyid la lta pa yang //
K12D0828_H0792:92b-13: kun byed rgyal po yin par rab tu grags //
K12D0828_H0792:92b-14: snang srid snod bcud 'byung ba lnga bsdus pa //
K12D0828_H0792:92b-15: kun byed rgyal po yin par rab tu grags //
K12D0828_H0792:92b-16: kun byed rgyal po las ni ma gtogs par //
K12D0828_H0792:92b-17: sangs rgyas sems can snang srid snod bcud dang //
K12D0828_H0792:92b-18: chos su grags pas bsdus pa thams cad la //
K12D0828_H0792:92b-19: kun byed rgyal po las ni gzhan mi snang //
K12D0828_H0792:92b-20: zhes sems dpa' rdo rjes bsgrags so //
K12D0828_H0792:92b-21: byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
K12D0828_H0792:92b-22: sems dpa' rdo rjes kun byed kyi rang bzhin rtogs pa'i sgo nas bsgrags pa'i le'u steng drug pa'o ////
K12D0828_H0792:93a-0: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las sems dpa' rdo rje la @93a *//
K12D0828_H0792:93a-1: bstan pa gtad pa'i le'u 'di gsungs so //
K12D0828_H0792:93a-2: kye; sems dpa' rdo rje 'di zungs shig /
K12D0828_H0792:93a-3: khyod ni rang 'byung ye shes te //
K12D0828_H0792:93a-4: khyod ni nga yis snying por byung //
K12D0828_H0792:93a-5: nga yi rang bzhin 'di zungs shig /
K12D0828_H0792:93a-6: nga yi rang bzhin rnam gsum las //
K12D0828_H0792:93a-7: sku gsum ston pa byung pa yang //
K12D0828_H0792:93a-8: de yi rang bzhin khyod kyis zungs //
K12D0828_H0792:93a-9: de yi bstan pa rnam gsum yang //
K12D0828_H0792:93a-10: bstan pa smra ba'i seng+ge yis //
K12D0828_H0792:93a-11: dus gnas 'khor la sogs pa yang //
K12D0828_H0792:93a-12: nyid kyis byas par lung ston cig /
K12D0828_H0792:93a-13: kun byed pa yi rang bzhin nam //
K12D0828_H0792:93a-14: kun byed nga yi mtshan bshad bzhin //
K12D0828_H0792:93a-15: khyod kyis nga yi rang bzhin zungs //
K12D0828_H0792:93a-16: nga ni kun gyi rang bzhin yin //
K12D0828_H0792:93a-17: sangs rgyas mes po nga yin gyi //
K12D0828_H0792:93a-18: sangs rgyas kun gyi sems po gyis //
K12D0828_H0792:93a-19: kun byed rgyal po nga nyid ni //
K12D0828_H0792:93a-20: sku gsum ston pa'i pha yin gyi //
K12D0828_H0792:93a-21: khyod kyis sku gsum pha ma gyis //
K12D0828_H0792:93a-22: dus gsum sangs rgyas mes po gyis //
K12D0828_H0792:93a-23: sems can kun gyi yang mes po //
K12D0828_H0792:93a-24: smra ba'i seng+ge smra ba'i tshe //
K12D0828_H0792:93a-25: ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams kun //
K12D0828_H0792:93a-26: sems dpa' chen po nyid dang ni //
K12D0828_H0792:93a-27: kun byed rgyal po nga las ni //
K12D0828_H0792:93a-28: gzhan yin smra bar ma byed cig /
K12D0828_H0792:93a-29: sku gsum bstan pa'i nang nas ni //
K12D0828_H0792:93a-30: rgyu dang 'bras bu rnam gnyis las //
K12D0828_H0792:93a-32: sems can sangs rgyas ming btags nas //
K12D0828_H0792:93a-33: sems kyis sangs rgyas 'bras bur sgrub //
K12D0828_H0792:93a-34: 'di ni nga yi bstan pa min //
K12D0828_H0792:93a-35: kun byed nga yi rang bzhin ni //
K12D0828_H0792:93b-1: sems can sangs rgyas gnyis med pas //
K12D0828_H0792:93b-2: sangs rgyas sems kyis sgrub ma byed //
K12D0828_H0792:93b-3: kun byed rgyal po nga nyid ni //
K12D0828_H0792:93b-4: sems nyid rang 'byung ye shes so; ;zhes gsungs so //
K12D0828_H0792:93b-5: byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po'i mdo las /
K12D0828_H0792:93b-6: bstan pa gtad pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa bdun pa'o ////
K12D0828_H0792:93b-7: byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po rdzogs so ////
K12D0828_H0792:93b-8: rgya gar gyi mkhan po shr'i sing ha pra bh'a dang /
K12D0828_H0792:93b-9: bod kyi lotstsha ba pa gor bee ro tsa nas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o ////
K12D0828_H0792:93b-10: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po
K12D0828_H0792:93b-11: rang 'byung ye shes skye ba med par rtogs nas
K12D0828_H0792:93b-12: cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so //
K12D0828_H0792:93b-13: de nas sems dpa' rdo rje dam pa des 'di skad ces zhus so //
K12D0828_H0792:93b-14: kye; ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po lags //
K12D0828_H0792:93b-15: legs par gsung ba'i mdo dag mthar phyin na //
K12D0828_H0792:93b-16: ston ba gsum po nyid kyis ji ltar rtogs //
K12D0828_H0792:93b-17: bstan pa gsum po nyid kyis ji ltar rtogs //
K12D0828_H0792:93b-18: 'khor gnas dus kyi rang bzhin ji ltar rtogs //
K12D0828_H0792:93b-19: nyid kyis ji ltar rtogs pa'i dgongs pa'i don //
K12D0828_H0792:93b-20: bdag cag rnams la legs par bstan du gsol //
K12D0828_H0792:93b-22: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po
K12D0828_H0792:93b-23: rtogs pa bshad pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud phyi ma
K12D0828_H0792:93b-24: 'di gsungs so // kye; sems dpa' rdo rje don 'di legs par nyon //
K12D0828_H0792:93b-25: ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yi //
K12D0828_H0792:94a-1: las byung pa'i ston pa sku gsum gyis //
K12D0828_H0792:94a-2: so sor 'dul ba'i don du gang gsungs pa //
K12D0828_H0792:94a-3: ston pa re dang gnas dang 'khor dag dang //
K12D0828_H0792:94a-4: bstan pa sdud pa so sor gnas par rtogs //
K12D0828_H0792:94a-5: kun byed nga yi rang bzhin rtogs pa min //
K12D0828_H0792:94a-6: kye; kun byed nga yi rtogs tshul bstan pa ni //
K12D0828_H0792:94a-7: nga nyid skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin te //
K12D0828_H0792:94a-8: de las byung ba'i chos ni thams cad kun //
K12D0828_H0792:94a-9: rang 'byung skye ba med pa'i dbyings su rtogs //
K12D0828_H0792:94a-10: kye; sems dpa' chen po legs par da nyon cig /
K12D0828_H0792:94a-11: nga nyid skye ba med par ngas rtogs pas //
K12D0828_H0792:94a-12: ston pa gsum yang skye ba med par rtogs //
K12D0828_H0792:94a-13: bstan pa gsum yang skye ba med par rtogs //
K12D0828_H0792:94a-14: 'khor gnas dus kyang skye ba med par rtogs //
K12D0828_H0792:94a-15: 'das pa'i sangs rgyas skye ba med par rtogs //
K12D0828_H0792:94a-16: da ltar byung pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs pa yang //
K12D0828_H0792:94a-17: skye ba med pa nyid du rab tu rtogs //
K12D0828_H0792:94a-18: ma byon slad kyis 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyang //
K12D0828_H0792:94a-19: skye ba med pa nyid du rab tu rtogs //
K12D0828_H0792:94a-20: kye; ston pa kun byed nyid kyis rtogs pa ltar //
K12D0828_H0792:94a-21: sems dpa' rdo rje khyod kyis rtogs par gyis //
K12D0828_H0792:94a-22: sems dpa' rdo rjes de ltar ma rtogs na //
K12D0828_H0792:94a-23: kun byed nga yi rang bzhin rtogs mi 'gyur //
K12D0828_H0792:94a-24: nga yi rang bzhin khyod kyis ma rtogs na //
K12D0828_H0792:94a-25: snying po'i rang bzhin bcu dag rtogs mi 'gyur //
K12D0828_H0792:94a-26: rang bzhin bcu yi don la rmongs pa yis //
K12D0828_H0792:94a-27: bsgom du med pa'i lung bcu ji ltar rtogs //
K12D0828_H0792:94b-0: kye; @94b nga yis chos rnams ji ltar bstan pa ltar //
K12D0828_H0792:94b-1: sems dpa' rdo rje khyod kyis rtogs par byos //
K12D0828_H0792:94b-2: nga yis rang bzhin skye med rtogs pa ltar //
K12D0828_H0792:94b-3: kun gyi rang bzhin skye med rtogs par //
K12D0828_H0792:94b-4: gyis; ;ston pa gsum yang skye ba med par rtogs //
K12D0828_H0792:94b-5: bstan pa gsum yang skye ba med par rtogs //
K12D0828_H0792:94b-6: 'khor gnas dus kyang skye ba med par rtogs //
K12D0828_H0792:94b-7: dus gsum sangs rgyas skye ba med par rtogs //
K12D0828_H0792:94b-8: rgyud drug sems can skye ba med par rtogs //
K12D0828_H0792:94b-9: sa chu me rlung nam mkha' lnga po yang //
K12D0828_H0792:94b-10: skye ba med pa'i ngang du rab tu rtogs //
K12D0828_H0792:94b-11: khams gsum srid gsum skye ba med par rtogs //
K12D0828_H0792:94b-12: 'dod lnga yul lnga skye ba med par rtogs //
K12D0828_H0792:94b-13: des na chos kun byang chub sems nyid de //
K12D0828_H0792:94b-14: byang chub sems ni kun byed rgyal po nyid //
K12D0828_H0792:94b-15: kun byed rgyal po skye ba med par rtogs //
K12D0828_H0792:94b-16: chos kun rtsa ba byang chub kun byed nga nyid de //
K12D0828_H0792:94b-17: nga nyid ma skyes dbyings su rtogs pa na //
K12D0828_H0792:94b-18: kun kyang skye med dbyings su rtogs par 'gyur //
K12D0828_H0792:94b-20: byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
K12D0828_H0792:94b-21: rtogs pa gleng gzhi'i le'u ste nga brgyad pa'o ////
K12D0828_H0792:94b-22: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos
K12D0828_H0792:94b-23: lta ba bsgom du med ba rtogs pa 'di gsungs
K12D0828_H0792:94b-24: so // kye; sems dpa' rdo rje legs par da rtogs shig /
K12D0828_H0792:94b-25: chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba kun byed la //
K12D0828_H0792:94b-26: lta dang blta bar bya ba yod ma yin //
K12D0828_H0792:95a-0: gang la gang ltar snying po @95a *//
K12D0828_H0792:95a-2: kun byed nga yi rang bzhin rtogs pa yin //
K12D0828_H0792:95a-3: kye; ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams ma lus kun //
K12D0828_H0792:95a-4: kun byed skye ba med par kun gnas par //
K12D0828_H0792:95a-5: su zhig snying po'i don la rtogs 'dod pas //
K12D0828_H0792:95a-6: kun byed nga yi rang bzhin rtogs par gyis //
K12D0828_H0792:95a-7: kye; kun byed nga yi rang bzhin ma rtogs par //
K12D0828_H0792:95a-8: so sor bstan pa'i lung dang yid 'thad cing //
K12D0828_H0792:95a-9: sku gsum ston pa'i don la gang 'jug pa //
K12D0828_H0792:95a-10: kun byed nga yi don dang shin tu 'gal //
K12D0828_H0792:95a-11: kye; ston pa kun byed nga nyid ma gtogs par //
K12D0828_H0792:95a-12: lta ba'i rang bzhin kun mkhyen skye med 'di //
K12D0828_H0792:95a-13: 'das dang da ltar ma 'ongs sangs rgyas kyis //
K12D0828_H0792:95a-14: ma rtogs mi rtogs rtogs par lung mi ston //
K12D0828_H0792:95a-15: mi skyes skye ba med pa'i sangs rgyas kyang //
K12D0828_H0792:95a-16: kun byed nga yi lung dang phrad nas ni //
K12D0828_H0792:95a-17: des kyang lta ba skye med rab tu rtogs //
K12D0828_H0792:95a-18: sangs rgyas kun gyi ngo bor byin gyis brlabs //
K12D0828_H0792:95a-19: kye; kun byed rgyal po ston pa'i lung med na //
K12D0828_H0792:95a-20: dus gsum sangs rgyas khams gsum sems can dang //
K12D0828_H0792:95a-21: ma skyes lam la lta ba'i rnal 'byor dang //
K12D0828_H0792:95a-22: la dgu lung dgu rgal yang sa bcu yis //
K12D0828_H0792:95a-23: rang rang dngos po'i don la rtog dpyod pas //
K12D0828_H0792:95a-24: ma skyes snying po'i don la sgrib pa'i phyir //
K12D0828_H0792:95a-25: rgyu 'bras bral ba'i byang chub snying po 'di //
K12D0828_H0792:95a-26: kun gyi lta ba'i don 'di rtogs pa med //
K12D0828_H0792:95a-27: kye; de bas ston pa kun byed nga yis kyang //
K12D0828_H0792:95b-0: 'khor gyi dang po sems dpa' rdo @95b rje la //
K12D0828_H0792:95b-1: sku gsum ston pa gsum gyis bshad pa'i lung //
K12D0828_H0792:95b-2: de la ma gnas shig par nga lung ston //
K12D0828_H0792:95b-3: de ltar nges pa'i lung 'di ma bstan na //
K12D0828_H0792:95b-4: dus gsum rgyal ba kun gyi yang mes po //
K12D0828_H0792:95b-5: kun byed rgyal po nga yi gdud chad nas //
K12D0828_H0792:95b-6: kun kyang 'khor pa'i lam la gzhol bar 'gyur //
K12D0828_H0792:95b-7: kye; de phyir sems dpa' rdo rje khyod kyis kyang //
K12D0828_H0792:95b-8: lta dang mi blta yul la 'das pa la //
K12D0828_H0792:95b-9: gang bltas don la rnam rtog mched pa'i phyir //
K12D0828_H0792:95b-10: rgyu 'bras can gyi lta ba khyod ma rtogs //
K12D0828_H0792:95b-11: shin tu rnal 'byor mi gnas theg pa la //
K12D0828_H0792:95b-12: bltas shing brtags pas mthong ba'i don 'gag pas //
K12D0828_H0792:95b-13: ma bcos snying po kun byed rang bzhin la //
K12D0828_H0792:95b-14: bltas pas mthong ba med pa'i don du rtogs //
K12D0828_H0792:95b-15: kye; kun byed rgyal po byang chub sems nga ni //
K12D0828_H0792:95b-16: chos rnams kun gyi blta ba'i me long ste //
K12D0828_H0792:95b-17: gsal la rang bzhin med par kun 'char bas //
K12D0828_H0792:95b-18: ma bltas rang bzhin gsal bar lung bstan to //
K12D0828_H0792:95b-19: ma skyes de bzhin nyid kyi yul nyid la //
K12D0828_H0792:95b-20: blta ba'i yul med mthong ba chen por rtogs //
K12D0828_H0792:95b-22: byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las; skye ba med pa'i le'u steng dgu pa'o ////
K12D0828_H0792:95b-23: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos
K12D0828_H0792:95b-24: dam tshig bsrung du med par rtogs pa 'di gsungs
K12D0828_H0792:96a-1: kye; ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po 'di //
K12D0828_H0792:96a-2: nga las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyis //
K12D0828_H0792:96a-3: dbang po'i khyad par rim par lung bstan pa //
K12D0828_H0792:96a-4: kun byed bsrung du yod pa'i don du rtogs //
K12D0828_H0792:96a-5: la las sdom dang 'dul khrims dag par rtogs //
K12D0828_H0792:96a-6: la las rig 'dzin sdom pa dag par rtogs //
K12D0828_H0792:96a-7: la las grangs dang rtsa ba yan lag rtogs //
K12D0828_H0792:96a-8: ji ltar brtags kyang rtogs par lung ma bstan //
K12D0828_H0792:96a-9: kun byed rgyal po'i dam tshig 'di //
K12D0828_H0792:96a-10: bsrung dang mi srung phyogs ris med par bstan //
K12D0828_H0792:96a-11: gang gis bsrung dang mi srung med rtogs pa //
K12D0828_H0792:96a-12: kun byed nga yi dam tshig rtogs pa yin //
K12D0828_H0792:96a-14: ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po nga //
K12D0828_H0792:96a-15: rtsa ba byang chub sems su kun gcig las //
K12D0828_H0792:96a-16: kun kyang snying po'i dam tshig yin pas na //
K12D0828_H0792:96a-17: bsrung dang mi srung don la 'das par rtogs //
K12D0828_H0792:96a-19: kun byed rgyal po'i lta ba'i dam tshig ni //
K12D0828_H0792:96a-20: skye med nam mkha' lta bur phyogs 'das pas //
K12D0828_H0792:96a-21: gang gis de dag legs par rtogs pa de //
K12D0828_H0792:96a-22: kun byed rgyal po'i dam tshig rtogs pa yin //
K12D0828_H0792:96a-24: ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po ngas //
K12D0828_H0792:96a-25: dam tshig bsrung du med par lung bstan pa //
K12D0828_H0792:96a-26: tshig tu rtsa ba'i rgyud las gang thos pa //
K12D0828_H0792:96a-27: 'dis ni don de legs par rtogs pa yin //
K12D0828_H0792:96a-29: kun byed rgyal pos snga bar lung bstan ltar //
K12D0828_H0792:96b-0: dus gsum chos @96b nyid 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir //
K12D0828_H0792:96b-1: kun byed rgyal po nga yi dam tshig ni //
K12D0828_H0792:96b-2: dus gsum du ni bsrung du med par rtogs //
K12D0828_H0792:96b-4: chos rnams rtsa ba sems su gcig pa ltar //
K12D0828_H0792:96b-5: dam tshig rtsa ba bsrung du med par gcig /
K12D0828_H0792:96b-6: de yang rang sems skye med rtogs pa yin //
K12D0828_H0792:96b-7: phyal ba dang ni med pa gcig pu dang //
K12D0828_H0792:96b-8: lhun gyis grub par bsrung ba kun las 'das //
K12D0828_H0792:96b-9: kun byed rgyal po'i dam tshig rnam grangs te //
K12D0828_H0792:96b-10: skye ba med par rtogs pa'i rnam grangs yin //
K12D0828_H0792:96b-11: snying po bsrung du med par don gcig la //
K12D0828_H0792:96b-12: rtogs dang mi rtogs khyad par la dgongs nas //
K12D0828_H0792:96b-13: drang dang nges pa gnyis su rnam phye nas //
K12D0828_H0792:96b-14: bsrung du yod dang med par lung bstan to //
K12D0828_H0792:96b-16: 'dis ni dam tshig bsrung med rtogs pa'i phyir //
K12D0828_H0792:96b-17: dus gsum rgyal ba'i dgongs pa rtogs pa yin //
K12D0828_H0792:96b-18: gang gis 'di ma rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa //
K12D0828_H0792:96b-19: rang sems snying po'i don la shin tu 'gal //
K12D0828_H0792:96b-21: kun byed nga yi dam las gang 'das shing //
K12D0828_H0792:96b-22: sku gsum ston pa'i dam la gnas pa dag /
K12D0828_H0792:96b-23: bskal pa brgya phrag du ma rnams su yang //
K12D0828_H0792:96b-24: snying po'i don dang phrad par shin tu dka'//
K12D0828_H0792:96b-25: de phyir kun byed nga yi lung thob pas //
K12D0828_H0792:96b-26: dam tshig bsrung du med par rtogs par byos //
K12D0828_H0792:96b-28: byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
K12D0828_H0792:96b-29: bsrung med dam tshig gi le'u ste drug cu pa'o ////
K12D0828_H0792:97a-1: byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des phrin las btsal du med pa 'di gsungs so //
K12D0828_H0792:97a-3: sems dpa' rdo rje legs par rtogs shig /
K12D0828_H0792:97a-4: ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po nga'i //
K12D0828_H0792:97a-5: rang bzhin las byung ston pa sku gsum gyis //
K12D0828_H0792:97a-6: so so ji ltar 'dul ba'i skur byung nas //
K12D0828_H0792:97a-7: phrin las btsal bas don dang phrad par rtogs //
K12D0828_H0792:97a-8: lus kyi las su phyag rgya bca' bar rtogs //
K12D0828_H0792:97a-9: ngag gis sngags dang bzlas pa byed par rtogs //
K12D0828_H0792:97a-10: sems kyis 'phro 'du ting 'dzin bsgom par rtogs //
K12D0828_H0792:97a-11: sgo gsum yal bar gnas pas grub mi rtogs //
K12D0828_H0792:97a-13: ston pa kun byed nga yi 'phrin las ni //
K12D0828_H0792:97a-14: btsal bar bya med phrin las lung bstan pas //
K12D0828_H0792:97a-15: don dang mi 'gal bsam pa mthar phyung bas; ;phrin las btsal du med par khyod kyis rtogs //
K12D0828_H0792:97a-17: ston pa kun byed nga yi 'phrin las ni //
K12D0828_H0792:97a-18: bdag don lhun gyis grub pas bya med rtogs //
K12D0828_H0792:97a-19: gzhan don dbyings su gcig pas btsal med rtogs //
K12D0828_H0792:97a-20: de ltar khyod kyis nges par rtogs par gyis //
K12D0828_H0792:97a-22: kun byed byang chub sems su kun byas pas //
K12D0828_H0792:97a-23: byang chub sems la bya mi dgos par rtogs //
K12D0828_H0792:97a-24: ma byas bya bral snying po byang chub la //
K12D0828_H0792:97a-25: bya dang mi bya tha snyad gang gis gdags //
K12D0828_H0792:97a-27: kun byed rgyal po nga yi phrin las ni //
K12D0828_H0792:97b-0: lus kyi las su @97b phyag rgya byar med rtogs //
K12D0828_H0792:97b-1: ngag gis bzlas brjod byar med snying por rtogs //
K12D0828_H0792:97b-2: sems kyis 'phro 'du sgom dang bral bar rtogs //
K12D0828_H0792:97b-3: 'das dang ma byon da ltar bzhugs pa dang //
K12D0828_H0792:97b-4: phrin las bya med rtogs nas mngon sangs rgyas //
K12D0828_H0792:97b-5: dus gsum rgyal ba rtogs la rag lus pas //
K12D0828_H0792:97b-6: sems dpa' rdo rje thos nas rtogs par gyis //
K12D0828_H0792:97b-8: nga las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyis //
K12D0828_H0792:97b-9: zhi rgyas dbang dang drag po'i lung bstan pa //
K12D0828_H0792:97b-10: rnam rtog mtshan ma grangs la dga' ba la //
K12D0828_H0792:97b-11: 'dul ba'i rtog pa grangs su bstan pa yin //
K12D0828_H0792:97b-13: de phyir kun byed nga yis lung bstan pa //
K12D0828_H0792:97b-14: thos pa'i don la ma nor brtag par byos //
K12D0828_H0792:97b-15: bya rtsol kun dang bral ba'i phrin las kyis //
K12D0828_H0792:97b-16: ma byas don kun rdzogs pas rtogs pa 'char //
K12D0828_H0792:97b-18: sems dpa' rdo rje don 'di legs par rtogs //
K12D0828_H0792:97b-19: snying po bya rtsol med pa'i don rtogs pas //
K12D0828_H0792:97b-20: bya dang mi bya med par don rdzogs pas //
K12D0828_H0792:97b-21: kun byed rgyal po'i phrin las 'di rtogs shig /
K12D0828_H0792:97b-23: ston pa'i rgyal po kun byed nga yis ni //
K12D0828_H0792:97b-24: byas pa thams cad mtshan ma'i lam du bstan //
K12D0828_H0792:97b-25: bya bral phrin las nges don 'di rtogs pas //
K12D0828_H0792:97b-26: 'gro ba kun byed rgyal po nyid du 'gyur //
K12D0828_H0792:97b-27: snying po bya bral sgo gsum ma nor bas //
K12D0828_H0792:97b-28: bya rtsol 'das pa'i don la rtogs pa ni //
K12D0828_H0792:97b-29: dus gsum rgyal ba'i dgongs pa gcig pa'i phyir //
K12D0828_H0792:98a-0: ma nor lam la rtogs pa nyid mchog @98a *//
K12D0828_H0792:98a-2: byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las //
K12D0828_H0792:98a-3: sgo gsum bya ba med par rtogs pa'i le'u ste drug cu gcig pa'o ////
K12D0828_H0792:98a-4: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos
K12D0828_H0792:98a-5: dkyil 'khor bskyed du med par rtogs pa 'di gsungs
K12D0828_H0792:98a-7: sems dpa' rdo rje don 'di da rtogs shig /
K12D0828_H0792:98a-8: nga las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyis //
K12D0828_H0792:98a-9: mtshan ma grangs la dga' ba'i gdul bya la //
K12D0828_H0792:98a-10: tshogs dang dkyil 'khor bskyed du yod par bstan //
K12D0828_H0792:98a-11: gang zhig sku gsum lam la bsten byas nas; ;mtshan ma grangs kyi sgo nas rtog byed pa //
K12D0828_H0792:98a-12: bskal pa bye ba brgya phrag yun ring du //
K12D0828_H0792:98a-13: dkyil 'khor bskyed du med pa'i don mi rtogs //
K12D0828_H0792:98a-15: de bas ston pa kun byed rgyal po ngas //
K12D0828_H0792:98a-16: tshogs dang dkyil 'khor rang bzhin lhun rdzogs pas //
K12D0828_H0792:98a-17: ma byas rang bzhin grub pa'i chos nyid la //
K12D0828_H0792:98a-18: bskyed cing bsag tu med pa'i don rtogs na //
K12D0828_H0792:98a-19: kye; kun byed nga yi dkyil 'khor bstan pa ni //
K12D0828_H0792:98a-20: rang las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa'i lung //
K12D0828_H0792:98a-21: ma lus snying por rdzogs pas bskyed 'bri med //
K12D0828_H0792:98a-22: ma bskyed dus gcig rdzogs pa dkyil 'khor rtogs //
K12D0828_H0792:98a-24: dkyil ni ma nor don gyi snying po la //
K12D0828_H0792:98a-25: 'khor ni 'khor 'das bde chen rdzogs par ldan //
K12D0828_H0792:98b-0: de ni dkyil 'khor snying po @98b kun gyi rtsa //
K12D0828_H0792:98b-1: dkyil 'khor ma lus 'di la 'dus par rtogs //
K12D0828_H0792:98b-3: kun byed rgyal po nga yi dkyil 'khor ni //
K12D0828_H0792:98b-4: ma lus snying por rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor te //
K12D0828_H0792:98b-5: gang gis de dag rdzogs par gang rtogs pa //
K12D0828_H0792:98b-6: dkyil 'khor bskyed pa med pa'i don la mkhas //
K12D0828_H0792:98b-8: ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po ngas //
K12D0828_H0792:98b-9: skye med byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor gyis //
K12D0828_H0792:98b-10: 'gro dang 'ong med kun tu khyab par gdal //
K12D0828_H0792:98b-11: rtogs pas skye ba med pa'i don la 'jug /
K12D0828_H0792:98b-13: rang 'byung ye shes lnga yi dkyil 'khor ni //
K12D0828_H0792:98b-14: rtogs dang ma rtogs don la rag lus pas; ;bskyed dang mi bskyed gnyis su mthong ba yin //
K12D0828_H0792:98b-15: dam pa rtogs na bskyed dang mi bskyed med //
K12D0828_H0792:98b-16: de phyir sems dpa' rdo rje khyod kyis kyang //
K12D0828_H0792:98b-17: sgra la ma gnas don nyid rtogs par gyis //
K12D0828_H0792:98b-18: gang gis de la rtogs pa skyes ma thag /
K12D0828_H0792:98b-19: kun byed rgyal po don la 'byor bar 'gyur //
K12D0828_H0792:98b-21: rgyal ba ma lus 'dus pa'i snying po ste //
K12D0828_H0792:98b-22: rang bzhin khyab par gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di //
K12D0828_H0792:98b-23: ma bskyed rang bzhin gnas pa'i don 'di la //
K12D0828_H0792:98b-24: rtogs pa ci bder mnos la ma rtsol cig /
K12D0828_H0792:98b-26: rgyal ba kun gyi rang bzhin kun byed ngas //
K12D0828_H0792:98b-27: dkyil 'khor bskyed du med par don rtogs pas //
K12D0828_H0792:98b-28: de yi rang bzhin sgra ma thos yin par //
K12D0828_H0792:98b-29: sems dpa' rdo rje khyod kyis rtogs par gyis //
K12D0828_H0792:99a-2: skye med byang chub sems su bstan pa ltar //
K12D0828_H0792:99a-3: sems dpa' rdo rje khyod kyis rtogs nas kyang //
K12D0828_H0792:99a-4: de bzhin 'khor la khyod kyis lung ston cig /
K12D0828_H0792:99a-6: byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
K12D0828_H0792:99a-7: dkyil 'khor bskyed du med par rtogs pa'i le'u ste drug cu gnyis pa'o ////
K12D0828_H0792:99a-8: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos
K12D0828_H0792:99a-9: dbang la bskur du med par rtogs pa 'di gsungs
K12D0828_H0792:99a-11: sems dpa' rdo rje don 'di des rtogs shig /
K12D0828_H0792:99a-12: nga ni ston pa kun byed rgyal po ste //
K12D0828_H0792:99a-13: nga las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyis //
K12D0828_H0792:99a-14: dbang la bskur thabs yod par lung phog pa //
K12D0828_H0792:99a-15: mtshan ma'i rtog pa'i lam la zhen chags pas //
K12D0828_H0792:99a-16: nga yis nga bzhin mi mthong bskal bar 'gyur //
K12D0828_H0792:99a-18: nga ni ston pa kun byed rgyal po ste //
K12D0828_H0792:99a-19: nga yi rang bzhin kun byed khyab rtogs pas //
K12D0828_H0792:99a-20: nga la gnyis pa'i don ni med pa'i phyir //
K12D0828_H0792:99a-21: bskur dang mi bskur don dang bral bar rtogs //
K12D0828_H0792:99a-22: gang zag mtshan ma grangs la dga' ba la //
K12D0828_H0792:99a-23: dbang gi grangs dang bskur ba'i rim pa bstan //
K12D0828_H0792:99a-24: ma bcos don la gnas pa'i gang zag la //
K12D0828_H0792:99a-25: ma bskur rang bzhin gnas pa'i rim pa bstan //
K12D0828_H0792:99a-27: kun byed rgyal po'i rang bzhin kun khyab pas //
K12D0828_H0792:99a-28: de ltar 'jug cing rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor la //
K12D0828_H0792:99b-0: ma bskur rang @99b bzhin gnas pa'i don rtogs pas //
K12D0828_H0792:99b-1: dbang la bskur thob med par lung ston cig /
K12D0828_H0792:99b-3: ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po ngas //
K12D0828_H0792:99b-4: bskur thob med par rtogs nas lung bstan pas; ;skye med rnam dag sems kyi dbang thob nas //
K12D0828_H0792:99b-5: rang bzhin bcu yi dbang la rtsol mi 'gyur //
K12D0828_H0792:99b-6: sngags dang phyag rgya'i dbang la re mi 'jog /
K12D0828_H0792:99b-7: rdzas dang mtshan ma'i dbang la sems mi 'chags //
K12D0828_H0792:99b-8: rang rgyud dag pas mtshan ma'i lha mi bsgom //
K12D0828_H0792:99b-9: gza' dang rgyu skar dus tshigs rim pa med //
K12D0828_H0792:99b-11: ston pa'i rgyal po nga yis rtogs pa ltar //
K12D0828_H0792:99b-12: sku gsum ston pa gsum gyis ma rtogs pas //
K12D0828_H0792:99b-13: rang bzhin bcu yi don la bsgribs pa'i phyir //
K12D0828_H0792:99b-14: kun byed nga yi rang bzhin rtogs pa med //
K12D0828_H0792:99b-16: ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po ngas //
K12D0828_H0792:99b-17: 'khor gyi dang po sku gsum ston pa las //
K12D0828_H0792:99b-18: rang bzhin ma bcos ji bzhin lung phog pa //
K12D0828_H0792:99b-19: mtshan ma'i 'jig rten lha la rten mi 'cha'//
K12D0828_H0792:99b-20: tshogs la mi rten dbang la rag ma lus //
K12D0828_H0792:99b-21: skye med rig pa'i dbang la kun rdzogs pas //
K12D0828_H0792:99b-22: ma btsal bde bar bzhag pas don kun rdzogs //
K12D0828_H0792:99b-24: nga ni ston pa kun byed rgyal po ste //
K12D0828_H0792:99b-25: sku gsum ston pa nga yis bkod pa yin; ;des bstan bcos kyang nga yis bkod pa yin //
K12D0828_H0792:99b-26: rang nyid rang la bkod pa bya mi dgos //
K12D0828_H0792:99b-28: de ltar kun byed rang bzhin gang rtogs pas //
K12D0828_H0792:100a-2: kun byed nga yi rang bzhin rtogs kyis la //
K12D0828_H0792:100a-3: mtshan 'dzin zhen pa'i dbang la ma rten cig /
K12D0828_H0792:100a-5: byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las //

K12D0828_H0792:100a-7: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos
K12D0828_H0792:100a-8: lam la bgrod du med par rtogs pa 'di gsungs
K12D0828_H0792:100a-10: ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yi //
K12D0828_H0792:100a-11: rang bzhin ma skyes gcig tu gnas pa la //
K12D0828_H0792:100a-12: skye med mngon du rtogs par dka' ba'i phyir //
K12D0828_H0792:100a-13: 'khor gyi dang po ston pa sku gsum gyis //
K12D0828_H0792:100a-14: rang rang dga' ba'i lam la gzud pa'i phyir //
K12D0828_H0792:100a-15: lam gyi khyad par bgrod du yod par bstan //
K12D0828_H0792:100a-16: blo chung rgyud nas don la 'dren pa'i phyir //
K12D0828_H0792:100a-17: drang ba'i lung du nga yis rtogs pa yin //
K12D0828_H0792:100a-19: tshogs dang sbyor lam mthong lam sgom pa'i lam //
K12D0828_H0792:100a-20: mthar phyin rim pa bskal pa brgya phrag dang //
K12D0828_H0792:100a-21: tshes gsum bdun sogs dus der 'grub par rtogs //
K12D0828_H0792:100a-22: de yis nga yi lam 'di rtogs mi 'gyur //
K12D0828_H0792:100a-24: kun byed rgyal po nga yi lam bshad pa //
K12D0828_H0792:100a-25: nga nyid skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin la //
K12D0828_H0792:100a-26: 'jug dang mi 'jug tshig las shin tu 'das //
K12D0828_H0792:100a-27: de phyir lam la bgrod du med par rtogs //
K12D0828_H0792:100a-28: lam sngar snang ba rnam rtog mtshan ma'i grangs //
K12D0828_H0792:100a-29: nga nyid mtshan ma'i yul las 'das pa'i phyir //
K12D0828_H0792:100b-0: @100b mtshan ma'i lam gyis bgrod du med par rtogs //
K12D0828_H0792:100b-2: kun byed nga yi lam la rim med de //
K12D0828_H0792:100b-3: skye med theg le chen por gcig pa'i phyir //
K12D0828_H0792:100b-4: gcig gi rang bzhin rtogs pa de yi phyir /
K12D0828_H0792:100b-5: lam la bgrod med gcig tu rtogs pa yin //
K12D0828_H0792:100b-7: ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po nga //
K12D0828_H0792:100b-8: nga la 'jug pa'i rim pa'i lam med de //

K12D0828_H0792:100b-10: de phyir sems dpa' rdo rje khyod nyid kyis //
K12D0828_H0792:100b-11: nga la rim par bgrod par ma byed cig /
K12D0828_H0792:100b-12: kye; nga ni mtha' bral nam mkha'i rang bzhin te //
K12D0828_H0792:100b-13: nam mkha'i mtha' la bgrong cing tshi chad ltar //
K12D0828_H0792:100b-14: nga yi rang bzhin lam gyis bgrod 'dod pa //
K12D0828_H0792:100b-15: tshi chad nad du de las che ba med //

K12D0828_H0792:105a-26: bya mi dgos te gdod nas grub //
