K12D0828_H0792:105a-28: khams gsum sems can khyod kyis byas //
K12D0828_H0792:105a-29: rgyud drug lam lnga khyod kyis byas //
K12D0828_H0792:105a-30: skye bzhi 'gro lnga khyod kyis byas //
K12D0828_H0792:105b-0: ston pa gsum @105b yang khyod kyis bkod //
K12D0828_H0792:105b-1: bstan pa gsum yang khyod kyis bkod //
K12D0828_H0792:105b-2: sdud pa gsum yang khyod kyis bkod //
K12D0828_H0792:105b-3: dus gsum 'khor yang khyod kyis bkod //
K12D0828_H0792:105b-4: rang 'byung lnga yang khyod las byung //
K12D0828_H0792:105b-5: rgyan gyi rgyu lnga khyod kyis bkod //
K12D0828_H0792:105b-6: rang bzhin bcu yang khyod kyis bstan //
K12D0828_H0792:105b-7: kun byed rgyal po byang chub sems //
K12D0828_H0792:105b-8: mdo lung kun gyi ngo bo khyod //
K12D0828_H0792:105b-9: bstan pa'i me long mun sel sgron //
K12D0828_H0792:105b-10: 'khor gyi mun pa sel mdzad pa //
K12D0828_H0792:105b-11: khyod ni rgyal ba kun gyi mes //
K12D0828_H0792:105b-12: rang 'byung thabs mchog kun gyi yab //
K12D0828_H0792:105b-13: 'byung gnas shes rab kun gyi yum //
K12D0828_H0792:105b-14: spros pa med cing zhi ba med //
K12D0828_H0792:105b-15: ngag las 'das shing snying po med //
K12D0828_H0792:105b-16: mkha' ltar dag cing spyod yul 'das //
K12D0828_H0792:105b-17: kun gyi rtogs par bya ba'i yul //
K12D0828_H0792:105b-18: sgro skur 'das pa chos kyi dbyings //
K12D0828_H0792:105b-19: thog ma tha ma dbus las 'das //
K12D0828_H0792:105b-21: rin chen padma'i snying po ltar //
K12D0828_H0792:105b-22: yid 'phrog tshim pa med pa'i sku //
K12D0828_H0792:105b-23: theg pa'i snying po ngag gi rgyan; ;sku gsung thugs la mtshan med de //
K12D0828_H0792:105b-24: bdag gis rtogs dka'i don rtogs pas //
K12D0828_H0792:105b-25: rgyal ba kun gyi yang mes po //
K12D0828_H0792:105b-26: kun byed rgyal po khyod la 'dud /
K12D0828_H0792:105b-28: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos
K12D0828_H0792:105b-29: sems dpa' rdo rje la 'di skad ces bsgrags pa
K12D0828_H0792:105b-30: mdzad do // ae ma ho sems dpa' rdo rje'i sku //
K12D0828_H0792:106a-2: gsang ba'i mdzod la mnga' brnyes shing //
K12D0828_H0792:106a-3: smra ba'i seng ge bla na med //
K12D0828_H0792:106a-4: dam pa'i gsang ba rtogs pa'i thugs //
K12D0828_H0792:106a-5: gsang ba rgya mtsho sgrogs pa'i gsung //
K12D0828_H0792:106a-6: yon tan lhun grub rdzogs pa'i sku //
K12D0828_H0792:106a-7: khyod ni rgyal ba'i sras po ste //
K12D0828_H0792:106a-8: kun byed rgyal po nga nyid ltar //
K12D0828_H0792:106a-9: rgyal ba kun gyi mes po gyis //
K12D0828_H0792:106a-10: sa khams rnams kyi mun sel gyis //
K12D0828_H0792:106a-11: rnal 'byor rnams kyi bla ma gyis //
K12D0828_H0792:106a-12: gsang ba kun gyi rgyal po ste //
K12D0828_H0792:106a-13: bstan pa phyi ma gsang ba 'di //
K12D0828_H0792:106a-14: rnal 'byor pa la lung ston cig /
K12D0828_H0792:106a-16: byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
K12D0828_H0792:106a-17: rtogs pa bsgrags shing bstod pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa dgu pa'o ////
K12D0828_H0792:106a-18: rgyud phyi ma zhes bya ba mdo lung bcu gnyis pa rdzogs so ////
K12D0828_H0792:106a-19: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos
K12D0828_H0792:106a-20: chos thams cad skye ba med par mnyam pa la
K12D0828_H0792:106a-21: gzigs shing dgongs nas cang yang mi gsung bar bzhugs
K12D0828_H0792:106a-22: so // de'i tshe sems dpa' rdo rje de nyid kyang ston ba de ltar gyur pa yang rig /
K12D0828_H0792:106a-23: chos thams cad skye ba med par rtogs pa la dgongs nas cang yang mi smra bar 'khod do //
K12D0828_H0792:106a-24: de nas phyogs bcu nas lhags shing 'khod pa'i 'dus
K12D0828_H0792:106a-25: pa phal mo che dag gis de ltar rtogs nas
K12D0828_H0792:106a-26: sems dpa' rdo rje la 'di skad ces bskul lo
K12D0828_H0792:106a-28: nges pa dam par bskul to //
K12D0828_H0792:106a-29: ae ma ho: sems dpa' rdo rje chen po bdag
K12D0828_H0792:106b-0: cag @106b la sman gdags pa'i slad du rtogs ba'i
K12D0828_H0792:106b-1: don la ji ltar bsgom pa de ston pa la
K12D0828_H0792:106b-2: zhu ba'i dus la bab bo //
K12D0828_H0792:106b-3: nges par dus la bab bo zhes bskul bas sems
K12D0828_H0792:106b-4: dpa' rdo rje de dga' ba'i mdangs dang bcas te
K12D0828_H0792:106b-5: dang zhing mos pa'i mdangs phyung nas stan las langs
K12D0828_H0792:106b-6: te ston pa'i mdun du 'di skad ces zhus so
K12D0828_H0792:106b-7: // kye; ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po lags //
K12D0828_H0792:106b-8: khyod kyi mdun du bdag 'khod de //
K12D0828_H0792:106b-9: bdag 'tshal ba yi don ni ci zhig mchis //
K12D0828_H0792:106b-10: bdag 'tshal don ni khyod kyis bstan du gsol //
K12D0828_H0792:106b-11: zhes zhus pa las byang chub kyi sems kun byed
K12D0828_H0792:106b-12: nyid cang yang mi gsung bar bzhugs te sems dpa'
K12D0828_H0792:106b-13: rdo rjes 'di skad ces zhus so //
K12D0828_H0792:106b-14: kye; ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po lags //
K12D0828_H0792:106b-15: chos sku skye med thig le'i rang bzhin la //
K12D0828_H0792:106b-16: ston pa gsum po nyid kyis ji ltar bsgom //
K12D0828_H0792:106b-17: bstan pa gsum du nyid kyis ji ltar bsgom //
K12D0828_H0792:106b-18: sdud pa gsum du nyid kyis ji ltar bsgom //
K12D0828_H0792:106b-19: 'khor gnas dus kyi rang bzhin ji ltar bsgom //
K12D0828_H0792:106b-20: chos rnams kun gyi don la ji ltar bsgom //
K12D0828_H0792:106b-21: bsgom pa'i lung bcu bdag la bstan du gsol //
K12D0828_H0792:106b-23: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsungs so //
K12D0828_H0792:106b-24: kye; sems dpa' rdo rje don la nga bsgoms shig /
K12D0828_H0792:106b-25: bsgom du med pa'i chos nyid byang chub la //
K12D0828_H0792:106b-26: sgom dang bsgom par bya ba gnyis med na //
K12D0828_H0792:106b-27: ma bsgoms rang bzhin bzhag na bsgom pa yin //
K12D0828_H0792:106b-28: don ni kun don skye ba med pa ste //
K12D0828_H0792:106b-29: rnam rtog mtshan ma de bzhin rig byas nas //
K12D0828_H0792:106b-30: dran bsam yid la rgyu ba ma lus kun //
K12D0828_H0792:107a-2: gang ltar bsam kyang sgom pa yin shes na //
K12D0828_H0792:107a-3: ma bsgom gang ltar bzhag kyang yengs pa med //
K12D0828_H0792:107a-4: kye; nga las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyis //
K12D0828_H0792:107a-5: mtshan ma bsgom la dga' ba'i gang zag la //
K12D0828_H0792:107a-6: rang rang gang ltar 'thad pa'i lung bzhin du //
K12D0828_H0792:107a-7: bsgom du yod ces kun la lung du bstan //
K12D0828_H0792:107a-8: kye; nga ni ston pa kun byed rgyal po la //
K12D0828_H0792:107a-9: ston pa rang 'byung rig pa'i ye shes las //
K12D0828_H0792:107a-10: ma bsdus ston pa gsum yang de la 'dus //
K12D0828_H0792:107a-11: ston pa de la bsgom du med par bstan //
K12D0828_H0792:107a-12: bstan pa brjod bral rig pa mtshon 'das la //
K12D0828_H0792:107a-13: bstan pa gsum yang de la 'dus te gnas //
K12D0828_H0792:107a-14: ma bcos rig pa'i gzhal yas 'og min na //
K12D0828_H0792:107a-15: gzhal yas gsum yang de la 'dus par bshad //
K12D0828_H0792:107a-16: ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad kun //
K12D0828_H0792:107a-17: snying po byang chub sems la kun 'dus pas //
K12D0828_H0792:107a-18: 'khor gsum dus gsum kun tu 'dus par bshad //
K12D0828_H0792:107a-19: ma bsdus rang bzhin 'du ba'i ye shes ni //
K12D0828_H0792:107a-20: sdud pa de las gzhan pa yod ma yin //
K12D0828_H0792:107a-21: ma bsgom rang bzhin bzhag pa'i lung 'di la //
K12D0828_H0792:107a-22: bsgom du yong dang med pa'i lung mi ston //
K12D0828_H0792:107a-23: re dogs sgro skur 'dzin pa'i sems mi 'jog /
K12D0828_H0792:107a-25: byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
K12D0828_H0792:107a-26: bsgom du yod med bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun cu pa'o ////
K12D0828_H0792:107a-27: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos
K12D0828_H0792:107a-28: lta ba sgom med kyi dgongs pa 'di gsungs so
K12D0828_H0792:107a-29: // kye; nga ni ston pa kun byed rgyal po ste //
K12D0828_H0792:107a-30: de las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyis //
K12D0828_H0792:107b-0: mtshan ma rtog pas @107b 'dul ba'i gang zag la //
K12D0828_H0792:107b-1: mtshan ma rtog pa'i ting 'dzin grangs su bstan //
K12D0828_H0792:107b-2: la las zhi ba'i ting 'dzin bsgom par byed //
K12D0828_H0792:107b-3: la las zab mo'i ting 'dzin sgom par byed //
K12D0828_H0792:107b-4: la las zhi gnas lhag mthong 'brel ba yi //
K12D0828_H0792:107b-5: bdag med ting nge 'dzin la gnas par byed //
K12D0828_H0792:107b-6: la la mtshan ma dag pa la brten nas //
K12D0828_H0792:107b-7: mtshan ma rje dang 'bangs su dmigs par byed //
K12D0828_H0792:107b-8: la la lta spyod 'brel med la brten nas //
K12D0828_H0792:107b-9: 'brel ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas par byed //
K12D0828_H0792:107b-10: la la mtshan med don la brten byas shing //
K12D0828_H0792:107b-11: mtshan ma'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas par byed //
K12D0828_H0792:107b-12: la las rang rgyud dag pa la brten nas //
K12D0828_H0792:107b-13: rnam gsum 'phro 'du'i don la gnas par byed //
K12D0828_H0792:107b-14: la la rgyu 'bras dag pa gtsor byas nas //
K12D0828_H0792:107b-15: 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas par byed //
K12D0828_H0792:107b-16: 'di dag mtshan ma grangs kyi ting 'dzin te //
K12D0828_H0792:107b-17: ston pa kun byed rgyal pos lung ma bstan //
K12D0828_H0792:107b-18: kye; ston pa kun byed nga yis lung bstan pa //
K12D0828_H0792:107b-19: ma lus skye med rnam dag ting 'dzin te //
K12D0828_H0792:107b-20: bsgom dang mi sgoms rkyen la rag ma lus //
K12D0828_H0792:107b-21: bsgom bya ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams kun //
K12D0828_H0792:107b-22: gang du ji ltar bzhag pa'i tshul med par //
K12D0828_H0792:107b-23: ma btsal rang sar bzhag pas bsgoms pa yin //
K12D0828_H0792:107b-24: kye; bsgom du med pa'i man ngag 'di dag la //
K12D0828_H0792:107b-25: tshig dang sgra las 'das pa'i don yin phyir //
K12D0828_H0792:107b-26: snga rabs kun byed rgyal pos lung ma bstan //
K12D0828_H0792:107b-27: phyi rabs kun byed rgyal pos lung mi ston //
K12D0828_H0792:107b-28: da ltar kun byed rgyal pos lung bstan med //
K12D0828_H0792:107b-29: kye; ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis //
K12D0828_H0792:107b-30: ma nor dgongs pa'i don la lung bstan pa //
K12D0828_H0792:107b-31: sgro skur 'das pa don gyi snying po la //
K12D0828_H0792:107b-32: bsgom dang mi sgom mkha' la rtsod pa 'dra //
K12D0828_H0792:107b-33: rtogs pa'i don la ma yengs dgongs pa ste //
K12D0828_H0792:108a-1: yin dngos po med ma yin //
K12D0828_H0792:108a-2: phyogs min phyogs las 'das pa ma yin par //
K12D0828_H0792:108a-3: bsgom dang mi sgom phyogs la gnas mi byed //
K12D0828_H0792:108a-4: kye; ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po ngas //
K12D0828_H0792:108a-5: bsgom dang mi sgom mtshon par mi nus ltar //
K12D0828_H0792:108a-6: snying po don la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor dang //
K12D0828_H0792:108a-7: sems dpa' rdo rje de la gnas par bya //
K12D0828_H0792:108a-8: kye; dus gsum ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis //
K12D0828_H0792:108a-9: skye med byang chub sems kyi dgongs pa la //
K12D0828_H0792:108a-10: ming dang tha snyad tshig tu 'di'o zhes //
K12D0828_H0792:108a-11: ma bstan mi ston bstan par mi mdzad do //
K12D0828_H0792:108a-12: lta ba bsgom du med par don rtogs na //
K12D0828_H0792:108a-13: bsgom dang mi bsgom res 'jog log pa'i lam //
K12D0828_H0792:108a-14: dam pa'i dgongs pa skye med thugs chud na //
K12D0828_H0792:108a-15: dam pa de la log dang ma log med //
K12D0828_H0792:108a-16: kye; kun byed rgyal po nga yis lung phog ltar //
K12D0828_H0792:108a-17: ma bsgoms bsgom du med par rtogs goms nas //
K12D0828_H0792:108a-18: skal ldan rnal 'byor gang zag su yang rung //
K12D0828_H0792:108a-19: kun byed rgyal po nyid du lung bstan to //
K12D0828_H0792:108a-21: byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
K12D0828_H0792:108a-22: lta sgom dbyer med pa'i le'u ste bdun cu gcig pa'o ////
K12D0828_H0792:108a-23: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos
K12D0828_H0792:108a-24: bsrung du med pa de bzhin nyid du gnas pa
K12D0828_H0792:108a-25: 'di gsungs so // ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis //
K12D0828_H0792:108a-26: rnam rtog mtshan ma'i lam la gnas pa'i bar //
K12D0828_H0792:108a-27: bsrung dang mi srung khyad par gnyis mthong ba //
K12D0828_H0792:108a-28: rtsa ba yan lag bcas par bsrung bar bsten //
K12D0828_H0792:108a-29: kye; kun byed nga ni ye nas de bzhin nyid //
K12D0828_H0792:108a-30: de bzhin nyid la gzung 'dzin med pa'i phyir //
K12D0828_H0792:108a-31: chos rnams de ltar gang gis rtogs pa la //
K12D0828_H0792:108a-32: bsrung dang mi srung 'du shes 'jug pa med //
K12D0828_H0792:108b-0: kye; nga ni ma bcos kun byed @108b byang chub sems //
K12D0828_H0792:108b-1: gnyen po mi bsten yul la 'jug mi byed //
K12D0828_H0792:108b-2: rang 'byung lhun grub rig pa'i dam chig la //
K12D0828_H0792:108b-3: 'da' nyams med pas ched du bsrung ba med //
K12D0828_H0792:108b-4: rang rig ma nor blo yi tshad ma yis //
K12D0828_H0792:108b-5: ma bcos snying po'i don la 'jug par byed //
K12D0828_H0792:108b-6: skye med thugs su chos kun ro gcig pas //
K12D0828_H0792:108b-7: 'jug dang mi 'jug mtha' la nga mi gnas //
K12D0828_H0792:108b-8: kye; sems dpa' rdo rje don la goms par gyis //
K12D0828_H0792:108b-9: dgongs don gsang pa'i rig pa ma shar na //
K12D0828_H0792:108b-12: kun byed nga yi lung dang phrad mi 'gyur //
K12D0828_H0792:108b-13: bsrung du med pa'i dam pa'i dgongs pa 'di //
K12D0828_H0792:108b-14: kun tu ye nas ma bsrungs gnas pa la //
K12D0828_H0792:108b-15: kun byed nga yi dgongs pa ma goms na //
K12D0828_H0792:108b-16: ji ltar bsrungs pa tshi chad nad du 'gyur //
K12D0828_H0792:108b-17: kye; kun byed nga yi dgongs pa'i dam tshig ni //
K12D0828_H0792:108b-18: ma yengs dran pas dngos po ye shes su //
K12D0828_H0792:108b-19: ma bcos sus kyang ma byas rang 'byung ste //
K12D0828_H0792:108b-20: rig pas dbang bsgyur bsrung dang mi srung med //
K12D0828_H0792:108b-21: ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad kun //
K12D0828_H0792:108b-22: rang 'byung snying por gsal bas dbang bsgyur bas //
K12D0828_H0792:108b-23: kun byed rgyal pos byas ba'i chos rnams la //
K12D0828_H0792:108b-24: rig dang ma rig gnyis ka'i yul las 'das //
K12D0828_H0792:108b-26: ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis //
K12D0828_H0792:108b-27: bsrung dang mi srung yul las 'das pa ltar //
K12D0828_H0792:108b-28: sems dpa' rdo rjes don la goms byas nas //
K12D0828_H0792:108b-29: nga yis 'khor la de ltar lung ston cig //
K12D0828_H0792:108b-30: nga yi 'khor la de ltar lung bstan na //
K12D0828_H0792:108b-31: bya ba'i 'du shes lam las grol bar 'gyur //
K12D0828_H0792:108b-32: skye ba med pas kun kyang zhi bar 'gyur //
K12D0828_H0792:108b-33: kun byed rgyal po nga yis thugs su 'gyur //
K12D0828_H0792:108b-34: kye; nga ni kun byed rgyal po byang chub sems //
K12D0828_H0792:108b-35: nga la sgro dang skur ba'i yul med byas //
K12D0828_H0792:108b-36: gang la sems par ma byed bsgom ma byed //
K12D0828_H0792:109a-1: gsum bcos par mi bya lhug par bzhag /
K12D0828_H0792:109a-2: gza' dang rgyu skar tshes grangs dus tshod med //
K12D0828_H0792:109a-3: yid la mi byed sngags dang phyag rgya bral //
K12D0828_H0792:109a-4: de bas kun byed byang chub sems nyid la //
K12D0828_H0792:109a-5: bsrung dang mi srung sa mtshams med par bshad //
K12D0828_H0792:109a-7: byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
K12D0828_H0792:109a-8: lta bsgom 'dar med pa'i le'u ste bdun cu gnyis pa'o ////
K12D0828_H0792:109a-9: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos
K12D0828_H0792:109a-10: bya med rtsol ba dang bral bar rtogs pa 'di
K12D0828_H0792:109a-11: gsungs so // kye; nga ni kun byed rgyal po ste //
K12D0828_H0792:109a-12: kun byed rgyal po nga yi dgongs pa ni //
K12D0828_H0792:109a-13: bsam pa'i yul las 'das pas bsgom du med //
K12D0828_H0792:109a-15: sems ni ji bzhin pa yi ngo bo ste //
K12D0828_H0792:109a-16: ji bzhin pa la 'chos par byed ma myong //
K12D0828_H0792:109a-17: rang 'byung nga la rgyu rkyen kun dang bral //
K12D0828_H0792:109a-18: sgo gsum btsal med lhug pa nyid du zhog /
K12D0828_H0792:109a-19: gang zhig bya rtsol mtshan ma'i rjes 'brangs pa //
K12D0828_H0792:109a-20: kun byed nga dang phrad par mi 'gyur ro //
K12D0828_H0792:109a-22: ston pa'i kun byed nga yi phrin las ni //
K12D0828_H0792:109a-23: bya ba med pas rtsol ba'i las mi byed //
K12D0828_H0792:109a-24: dmigs pa med pas bsgom pa'i 'du shes bral //
K12D0828_H0792:109a-25: 'du 'brel med pas ma brjed yid la zhog /
K12D0828_H0792:109a-26: byung tshor skye ba med pas gsal 'gyur nas //
K12D0828_H0792:109b-0: gang yang byas pa med par las @109b kun grub //
K12D0828_H0792:109b-2: nga ni ston pa kun byed rgyal po ste //
K12D0828_H0792:109b-3: rgyal ba kun gyi phrin las ngas byas kyang //
K12D0828_H0792:109b-4: rang 'byung ye shes bya med rdzogs pa'i phyir //
K12D0828_H0792:109b-5: ji bzhin pa yi las la byed ma myong; ;ma btsal ji bzhin nyid du sems dpa' zhog /
K12D0828_H0792:109b-6: ji bzhin ma bcos rgyal ba'i dgongs pa la //
K12D0828_H0792:109b-7: sems dang sems las byung ba ci skyes kyang //
K12D0828_H0792:109b-8: de nyid skye med nyid du gnas shes na //
K12D0828_H0792:109b-9: bya rtsol mtshan ma'i 'du shes kun dang bral //
K12D0828_H0792:109b-11: sems dpa' rdo rje ji bzhin nyid sgoms shig /
K12D0828_H0792:109b-12: rtogs pa rang sar grol ba'i lta ba la //
K12D0828_H0792:109b-13: ma yengs rang bzhin bzhag pas bya btsal med //
K12D0828_H0792:109b-14: kun kyang rang 'byung rang sar grol ba yin //
K12D0828_H0792:109b-16: sems dpa' rdo rje ji bzhin nyid sgoms shig /
K12D0828_H0792:109b-17: rang lus mi bcos dbang po mi rtul te //
K12D0828_H0792:109b-18: ngag kyang mi gdams bya rtsol byar yang med //
K12D0828_H0792:109b-19: sems kyang gang gtad mi g-yo'i ngang la bzhag /
K12D0828_H0792:109b-20: bya ba med pa'i phrin las 'di bsgoms pas //
K12D0828_H0792:109b-21: byas pa med par don kun rdzogs par 'gyur //
K12D0828_H0792:109b-23: ji bzhin rtsol bral bde ba chen po la //
K12D0828_H0792:109b-24: sgo gsum mi rtsol bcos shing dmigs mi byed //
K12D0828_H0792:109b-25: yid la mi byed mtshan ma'i rjes mi 'brangs //
K12D0828_H0792:109b-26: rang 'byung ye shes bde ba'i don la bzhag /
K12D0828_H0792:109b-27: 'di ni rang 'byung 'od gsal dgongs pa ste //
K12D0828_H0792:109b-28: kun byed rgyal po'i dgongs pa'i phrin las so //
K12D0828_H0792:110a-1: rdo rje ji bzhin nyid sgoms shig /
K12D0828_H0792:110a-2: ma bcos ji bzhin nyid la 'jug ba la //
K12D0828_H0792:110a-3: tshad ma mi dgos gnyen pos bcos mi dgos //
K12D0828_H0792:110a-4: rtogs pa'i don la ma bcos de bzhin zhog /
K12D0828_H0792:110a-6: bya ba med pa'i rang bzhin las 'di la //
K12D0828_H0792:110a-7: sgo gsum rtsol ba byas pas zin mi 'gyur //
K12D0828_H0792:110a-8: kun byed rgyal po'i dgongs pa la gnas pas //
K12D0828_H0792:110a-9: nga yi dgongs pa phrin las lhun gyis grub //
K12D0828_H0792:110a-11: byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
K12D0828_H0792:110a-12: ji bzhin pa la bya rtsol dang bral bar gnas pa'i le'u ste bdun cu gsum pa'o ////
K12D0828_H0792:110a-13: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos
K12D0828_H0792:110a-14: snying po 'du 'bral med par gnas pa 'di gsungs
K12D0828_H0792:110a-16: ji bzhin pa la sems dpa' rdo rje sgom //
K12D0828_H0792:110a-17: ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis //
K12D0828_H0792:110a-18: snying po dgod du med par bstan pa ni //
K12D0828_H0792:110a-19: ji bzhin gtso 'khor med pa'i don du bstan //
K12D0828_H0792:110a-21: rig pa'i rgyal po gsal bar dbang bsgyur bas //
K12D0828_H0792:110a-22: snying po rtsol sgrub 'das pa'i bdag nyid de //
K12D0828_H0792:110a-23: rtogs pa ye shes mchog gis len par byed //
K12D0828_H0792:110a-24: 'di ni kun byed rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor yin //
K12D0828_H0792:110a-26: ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis //
K12D0828_H0792:110a-27: snying po sku yi dkyil 'khor bkod pa ni //
K12D0828_H0792:110a-28: ji ltar snang zhing gnas pa'i chos rnams kun //
K12D0828_H0792:110b-0: skye @110b ba med ba'i chos dbyings ngang la bkod //
K12D0828_H0792:110b-1: snying po'i don la blang dor med pa'i phyir //
K12D0828_H0792:110b-2: de yang kun byed nga yis bkod ba yin //
K12D0828_H0792:110b-4: ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis //
K12D0828_H0792:110b-5: snying po gsung gi dkyil 'khor bkod pa ni //
K12D0828_H0792:110b-6: ji ltar grags shing gnas pa'i chos rnams ni //
K12D0828_H0792:110b-7: skye ba med pa'i dbyings las gsung du bkod //
K12D0828_H0792:110b-8: snying po brjod du med pa'i gsung la 'dus //
K12D0828_H0792:110b-9: de yang kun byed rgyal pos bkod pa yin //
K12D0828_H0792:110b-11: ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis //
K12D0828_H0792:110b-12: snying po rig pa'i dkyil 'khor bkod pa ni //
K12D0828_H0792:110b-13: ji ltar dran rig rtog pa thams cad kun //
K12D0828_H0792:110b-14: ma skyes kun byed nyid kyi don du rig /
K12D0828_H0792:110b-15: kun byed nga yi sku gsung thugs nyid ni //
K12D0828_H0792:110b-16: ma bcos rnal du bzhag pa'i dkyil 'khor gsum //
K12D0828_H0792:110b-17: ma bkod dus gcig rdzogs pa'i don rtogs pas //
K12D0828_H0792:110b-18: lhun grub snying po don la 'jug par byed //
K12D0828_H0792:110b-20: sems dpa' rdo rje ji bzhin nyid bsgoms shig /
K12D0828_H0792:110b-21: rang 'byung snying po mchog gi dkyil 'khor la //
K12D0828_H0792:110b-22: sgo gsum lhug pas ji bzhin ngang bzhag na //
K12D0828_H0792:110b-23: kun byed nga yi dgongs par gnas pa yin //
K12D0828_H0792:110b-24: snga rabs 'das pa'i kun byed rgyal pos kyang //
K12D0828_H0792:110b-25: dgongs pa rnal du bzhag pas don rdzogs la //
K12D0828_H0792:110b-26: ma byon dus kyi kun byed rgyal pos kyang //
K12D0828_H0792:110b-27: ma bcos rnal du bzhag pas don rdzogs 'gyur //
K12D0828_H0792:110b-28: da ltar bzhugs pa'i kun byed rgyal pos kyang //
K12D0828_H0792:111a-0: dgongs pa rnal du bzhag te gnas @111a *//
K12D0828_H0792:111a-3: sems dpa' rdo rje chen po khyod sgoms shig /
K12D0828_H0792:111a-4: nga yi 'khor du gtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa //
K12D0828_H0792:111a-5: kun byed rgyal po'i dgongs pa 'di nyid la //
K12D0828_H0792:111a-6: ma btsal rnal du bzhag par lung ston cig /
K12D0828_H0792:111a-7: dgongs pa rnal du bzhag pa'i don 'di ni //
K12D0828_H0792:111a-8: kun gyi spyod yul min pas mi shes shing //
K12D0828_H0792:111a-9: mnyam par bzhag pas rtogs pa'i yul las 'das //
K12D0828_H0792:111a-10: kun byed rgyal po de la gnas par byed //
K12D0828_H0792:111a-12: byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
K12D0828_H0792:111a-13: snying po don la gnas pa'i le'u ste bdun cu bzhi pa'o ////
K12D0828_H0792:111a-14: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos
K12D0828_H0792:111a-15: rig pa dbang sgyur la gnas pa 'di gsungs so
K12D0828_H0792:111a-17: sems dpa' rdo rje ji bzhin nyid sgoms shig /
K12D0828_H0792:111a-18: rig pa'i rgyal pos gsal bar dbang bsgyur nas //
K12D0828_H0792:111a-19: mtshan ma'i bde ba'i dbang la rag ma lus //
K12D0828_H0792:111a-20: rtogs nas mi rtog don la ji bzhin zhog /
K12D0828_H0792:111a-22: kun byed rgyal po dbang thob rig pa na //
K12D0828_H0792:111a-23: dngos po ma bcos ji bzhin rtag tu shar //
K12D0828_H0792:111a-24: rgyu dang rkyen med zhi ba mchog gi lam //
K12D0828_H0792:111a-25: gzhi bzhag gang ltar bzhag kyang de nyid dang //
K12D0828_H0792:111a-26: kun byed rgyal po thabs chen rtogs pa'i dbang //
K12D0828_H0792:111a-27: kun kyang ji bzhin yul la 'jug pa na //
K12D0828_H0792:111a-28: skyon dang yon tan gnyi ga mnyam shes nas //
K12D0828_H0792:111b-0: 'jug dang mi 'jug tshig @111b las shin tu 'das //
K12D0828_H0792:111b-2: kun byed rig pas dbang bsgyur dgongs pa 'di //
K12D0828_H0792:111b-3: ngag gis smrang med dmigs pa'i yul las 'das //
K12D0828_H0792:111b-4: dran pa zhi zhing spros pa med pa ste //
K12D0828_H0792:111b-5: mkha' ltar khyab cing phyogs cha yongs kyis med //
K12D0828_H0792:111b-7: sems dpa' rdo rje de bzhin nyid sgoms shig /
K12D0828_H0792:111b-8: bsgom dang mi sgom yul las 'das pa la //
K12D0828_H0792:111b-9: gnyi ka 'byung 'jug re dogs med pa yis //
K12D0828_H0792:111b-10: mnyam par mi 'jug don la sgom mi byed //
K12D0828_H0792:111b-11: dbang dang dngos grub mi len bcos su med //
K12D0828_H0792:111b-12: kun byed rgyal po nyid la gus par gnas //
K12D0828_H0792:111b-14: ston pa kun byed rgyal po nga nyid ni //
K12D0828_H0792:111b-15: rang 'byung sgom du med pa'i snying po ste //
K12D0828_H0792:111b-16: ye shes gsal la sgrub pa med pa yin //
K12D0828_H0792:111b-17: dbang ni rtogs pas re dogs bcad pa yin //
K12D0828_H0792:111b-18: 'di la nges par 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor pa //
K12D0828_H0792:111b-19: shin tu rnal 'byor rgyu 'bras 'das pa'i lung //
K12D0828_H0792:111b-20: ma bcos ye shes kun byed rgyal po la //
K12D0828_H0792:111b-21: gang ltar 'di ltar 'jog ces lung mi ston //
K12D0828_H0792:111b-22: snga bar ma gsungs phyis kyang mi gsung zhing //
K12D0828_H0792:111b-23: da ltar byung bar gsungs par mi mdzad do //
K12D0828_H0792:111b-25: ston pa'i ngo bo kun byed rgyal po yis //
K12D0828_H0792:111b-26: bsgom zhing bsam du med pa'i chos nyid la //
K12D0828_H0792:111b-27: ma bsams yal bar gnas pas 'khor ba nyid //
K12D0828_H0792:111b-28: btsal zhing bsgoms pas rtog pa'i mtshan ma'i lam //
K12D0828_H0792:111b-29: de bas re dogs bcas pa'i ting 'dzin ni //
K12D0828_H0792:112a-0: @112a *// gnas pas grol bar kun byed lung mi ston //
K12D0828_H0792:112a-2: ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis //
K12D0828_H0792:112a-3: rtogs pas gnyi ka'i 'ching ba rab bcad nas //
K12D0828_H0792:112a-4: mi 'gal mnyam pa'i don la gnas byas pas //
K12D0828_H0792:112a-5: kun byed da yi dgongs pa lhun gyis grub //
K12D0828_H0792:112a-7: gang gis 'ching ba de rtogs bcad byas shing //
K12D0828_H0792:112a-8: grol bar mi 'jug mya ngan 'das mi len //
K12D0828_H0792:112a-9: snying po'i don la phyogs ris dmigs mi 'dzin //
K12D0828_H0792:112a-10: don la mi bsgom snying rje yul mi 'jug /
K12D0828_H0792:112a-12: kun byed rgyal po nga yis gang bstan pa //
K12D0828_H0792:112a-13: sems dpa' rdo rjes don la goms par gyis //
K12D0828_H0792:112a-14: ye shes dran pas dbang bsgyur rig pa'i ngang /
K12D0828_H0792:112a-15: 'di ni kun byed rgyal por ngas lung bstan //
K12D0828_H0792:112a-17: byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
K12D0828_H0792:112a-18: rig pa dbang bsgyur la gnas pa'i le'u ste bdun cu lnga pa'o ////
K12D0828_H0792:112a-19: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos snying po don gyi lam 'di gsungs so //
K12D0828_H0792:112a-21: sems dpa' rdo rje don la nga bsgoms shig /
K12D0828_H0792:112a-22: snying po mi rtogs don gyi lam 'di la //
K12D0828_H0792:112a-23: nam mkha' mtha' ltar gnas pas ma khyab med //
K12D0828_H0792:112a-24: skye med min pa med pas mi sgom med //
K12D0828_H0792:112a-25: rtog dpyod yul las 'das pas dmigs su med //
K12D0828_H0792:112a-26: snying po mtshan ma 'das pa'i yul 'di la //
K12D0828_H0792:112b-0: bgrod pa'i yul las 'das @112b pas bgrod ma byed //
K12D0828_H0792:112b-1: lam la mi bgrod sa la mi sbyong zhing //
K12D0828_H0792:112b-2: mi rtog bde la gnas pas lhun gyis grub //
K12D0828_H0792:112b-4: kun byed rgyal po nga yi lam nyid ni //
K12D0828_H0792:112b-5: chos kyi dbyings su gcig pas bgrod du med //
K12D0828_H0792:112b-6: snying po don dang 'grogs pas yengs pa med //
K12D0828_H0792:112b-7: thig le gcig tu 'dus pas gar mi 'gro /
K12D0828_H0792:112b-9: de yi don la sems dpa' rdo rje sgom //
K12D0828_H0792:112b-10: bsgom du med pa'i don la ma bsgoms na //
K12D0828_H0792:112b-11: mtshan ma'i grangs la bskal pa brgyar bsgoms kyang //
K12D0828_H0792:112b-12: kun byed nga yi dgongs pa rtogs mi 'gyur //
K12D0828_H0792:112b-13: rnam rtog yul la mtshan ma'i grangs las 'das //
K12D0828_H0792:112b-14: kun byed bya mi dgos la byar yang med //
K12D0828_H0792:112b-15: bya ba mtshan ma'i rnal 'byor rjes zhugs shing //
K12D0828_H0792:112b-16: bya bas mi zin rtog pas rtog pa 'jil //
K12D0828_H0792:112b-17: chu las rnyog ma bzhin te byis pas bslus //
K12D0828_H0792:112b-19: sems dpa' rdo rje don la legs par sgoms //
K12D0828_H0792:112b-20: nga ni ston pa kun byed rgyal po ste //
K12D0828_H0792:112b-21: dus gsum rgyal ba kun gyi lam 'dren pas //
K12D0828_H0792:112b-22: khyod kyang nga yi lam la legs par zhugs //
K12D0828_H0792:112b-23: 'das pa'i sangs rgyas skye med lam du zhugs //
K12D0828_H0792:112b-24: ma byon skye med lam la 'jug par 'gyur //
K12D0828_H0792:112b-25: da ltar sangs rgyas skye med nyid la gnas //
K12D0828_H0792:112b-26: des na kun byed rgyal po kun gyi lam //
K12D0828_H0792:112b-28: lam 'dir 'jug cing bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor ba //
K12D0828_H0792:112b-29: da lta nyid nas rgyal ba'i sa la gnas //
K12D0828_H0792:113a-1: pa mi 'dzin phyogs ris gzung du med //
K12D0828_H0792:113a-2: snying po'i lam la 'jug dang mi 'jug 'das //
K12D0828_H0792:113a-4: rnal 'byor dus gcig 'jug pa'i skal ldan la; ;kun byed rgyal po'i dgongs pa bstan byas nas //
K12D0828_H0792:113a-5: rtogs pa'i rlung la dran zhing 'dris pa las //
K12D0828_H0792:113a-6: bsgom zhing 'jug tu med par lung ston cig /
K12D0828_H0792:113a-8: nga ni ston pa kun byed byang chub sems //
K12D0828_H0792:113a-9: ma lus kun byas byang chub sems su byas //
K12D0828_H0792:113a-10: sems nyid skye ba med pa'i lam du byas //
K12D0828_H0792:113a-11: skye med bde ba'i lam la 'jug tu med //
K12D0828_H0792:113a-12: skal ldan rgyal sras dam par nges pa la //
K12D0828_H0792:113a-13: kun byed nga yi lam 'di goms byas nas //
K12D0828_H0792:113a-14: bgrod med rtsal med snying po'i don rtogs nas //
K12D0828_H0792:113a-15: kun byed rgyal po nyid du the tshom med; ;ces gsungs so //
K12D0828_H0792:113a-16: byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las //
K12D0828_H0792:113a-17: snying po lam la gnas pa'i le'u ste bdun cu drug pa'o ////
K12D0828_H0792:113a-18: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos don la spyad du med pa 'di gsungs so //
K12D0828_H0792:113a-20: sems dpa' rdo rje rtogs pa'i don la sgoms //
K12D0828_H0792:113a-21: ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis //
K12D0828_H0792:113a-22: bsam gyis mi khyab nges pa'i dus bstan pa //
K12D0828_H0792:113a-23: snying po rtogs pa'i sa zhes bshad pa yin //
K12D0828_H0792:113a-24: bde chen nges pa'i dus su gang bstan pa //
K12D0828_H0792:113b-0: de ni goms pa'i sa zhes @113b bshad pa yin //
K12D0828_H0792:113b-1: gzhan dag rtsol zhing spyod pa'i khyad par dag /
K12D0828_H0792:113b-2: khams gsum 'khor ba'i snying po bsgribs pa'i sa //
K12D0828_H0792:113b-3: sa zhes bya ba gnas pa'i khyad par te //
K12D0828_H0792:113b-4: gang la gang gnas de ni sa yin no //
K12D0828_H0792:113b-6: sku gsum ston pa'i sa la grangs bgrangs kyang //
K12D0828_H0792:113b-7: kun byed rgyal po'i sa la rim pa med //
K12D0828_H0792:113b-8: sa dang sa yi rim pa'i khyad par yod //
K12D0828_H0792:113b-9: ces pa sku gsum ston pas 'khor la bstan pa yin //
K12D0828_H0792:113b-11: ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis //
K12D0828_H0792:113b-12: mnyam nyid skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin la //
K12D0828_H0792:113b-13: thabs dang snying po rtogs pa'i gang zag gis //
K12D0828_H0792:113b-14: sgrib dang sa yi khyad par med par bstan //
K12D0828_H0792:113b-15: kun byed rgyal po nga yi rang bzhin ni //
K12D0828_H0792:113b-16: dus gsum 'byung 'jug mi byed yid la byed pa med //
K12D0828_H0792:113b-17: ris su mi lta mtshan ma'i yul mi tshol //
K12D0828_H0792:113b-18: kun byed rgyal po'i dgongs pa'i lung du bstan //
K12D0828_H0792:113b-20: kun byed rgyal po nga yi dgongs pa ni //
K12D0828_H0792:113b-21: tshig dang yi ges mtshon pa mi rnyed cing //
K12D0828_H0792:113b-22: sgra dang tshad mas gtan la dbab du med //
K12D0828_H0792:113b-23: skye ba med pas 'gag pa med pa yin //
K12D0828_H0792:113b-24: 'phel ba med cing yongs su 'grib mi byed //
K12D0828_H0792:113b-25: mtshan ma min zhing de nyid min pa'ang min; ;kye /
K12D0828_H0792:113b-26: ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po ngas //
K12D0828_H0792:113b-27: ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad kun //
K12D0828_H0792:113b-28: skye ba med pa'i ngo bor byin brlabs pas //
K12D0828_H0792:114a-2: kun byed rgyal po nga yi byin rlabs kyis //
K12D0828_H0792:114a-3: sems dpa' rdo rjes ji ltar rtogs pa ltar //
K12D0828_H0792:114a-4: phyi rabs kun byed lung la dad pa la; ;dngos po skye ba med par byin rlobs shig /
K12D0828_H0792:114a-5: de ltar sgom du med pa'i snying po la //
K12D0828_H0792:114a-6: ma yengs dran pas bzung ba man ngag yin //
K12D0828_H0792:114a-7: kun byed rgyal po byang chub sems 'di la; ;bshad pas ma yin tshigs su bcad pas min //
K12D0828_H0792:114a-8: bsgom pas ma yin ma bsgoms pas kyang min //
K12D0828_H0792:114a-9: snying po sngags dang phyag rgya kun las 'das //
K12D0828_H0792:114a-11: kun byed rgyal po nga yis bstan pa'i sa //
K12D0828_H0792:114a-12: ma lus 'di la brten pas spong len med //
K12D0828_H0792:114a-13: phyogs cha med par khyab pas che chung med //
K12D0828_H0792:114a-14: chos kyi dbyings su gnas pas rtog dang mi rtog
K12D0828_H0792:114a-15: med; ;de phyir dus gcig gnas pa'i sa 'di la
K12D0828_H0792:114a-16: // sems dpa' rdo rje legs par gnas par gyis /
K12D0828_H0792:114a-18: byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
K12D0828_H0792:114a-19: don la sbyang med kyi le'u ste bdun cu bdun pa'o ////
K12D0828_H0792:114a-20: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos
K12D0828_H0792:114a-21: mnyam pa la blang dor med pa'i dgongs pa 'di
K12D0828_H0792:114a-23: ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis //
K12D0828_H0792:114a-24: skye med byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin la //
K12D0828_H0792:114a-25: ji bzhin ma bcos gnas pa'i dgongs pa la //
K12D0828_H0792:114b-0: blang dang dor @114b ba yod par lung ma bstan //
K12D0828_H0792:114b-1: skye med rang bzhin sgros skur bral ba ste //
K12D0828_H0792:114b-2: blang dang dor ba sgro skur don tu bstan //
K12D0828_H0792:114b-3: su zhig snying po'i don la zhugs pa yis //
K12D0828_H0792:114b-4: sgro skur 'das pa snying po'i don du bstan //
K12D0828_H0792:114b-5: gang yang bsam pa kun las 'das byed pa //
K12D0828_H0792:114b-6: blang dor med par rtogs par lung bstan to //
K12D0828_H0792:114b-8: sems dpa' rdo rje snying po'i don la sgoms //
K12D0828_H0792:114b-9: nga ni ma nor don gyi snying po la //
K12D0828_H0792:114b-10: blang dor rnam rtog bcos pa'i yul med do //
K12D0828_H0792:114b-11: rang bzhag bde ba mchog gis goms par byed //
K12D0828_H0792:114b-12: kun byed rtogs na snying por kun gnas pas //
K12D0828_H0792:114b-13: snying po'i don la blang dor lung ma bstan //
K12D0828_H0792:114b-14: skye zhing 'jig pa'i chos su'ang lung ma bstan //
K12D0828_H0792:114b-15: bzang ngan gtsang sme'i chos su'ang lung ma bstan //
K12D0828_H0792:114b-16: rtog dpyod bsam pa'i yul las 'das par bstan //
K12D0828_H0792:114b-17: kye; sems dpa' rdo rje nges par da sgoms shig /
K12D0828_H0792:114b-18: bsgom dang bsgom par bya ba'i yul nyid ni //
K12D0828_H0792:114b-19: ma bcos kun byed sems kyi rang bzhin la //
K12D0828_H0792:114b-20: bsgom dang mi sgom blo yi yul las 'das //
K12D0828_H0792:114b-22: kun byed rgyal po byang chub sems nga ni //
K12D0828_H0792:114b-23: nga yi 'khor du 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams la //
K12D0828_H0792:114b-24: blang dang dor ba'i chos nyid nga mi ston //
K12D0828_H0792:114b-25: gcig la gnyis su dbye ba'i chos mi ston //
K12D0828_H0792:114b-26: rtog dang dpyod 'das rtog dpyod bsam mi byed //
K12D0828_H0792:114b-27: ma gcos ji bzhin pa la 'chos ma byed //
K12D0828_H0792:114b-28: bya ba gang btang ci snang chos nyid la //
K12D0828_H0792:115a-3: sems dpa' rdo rje chen po da sgoms shig /
K12D0828_H0792:115a-4: blang dor med pa'i chos nyid byang chub la //
K12D0828_H0792:115a-5: mkha' ltar gnas pas lus sems bcos su med //
K12D0828_H0792:115a-6: 'du shes zhen 'dzin med pas bsgom du med //
K12D0828_H0792:115a-7: mkha' ltar rab zhi rnyog pa kun bral la //
K12D0828_H0792:115a-8: yul la mi 'jug dgongs pa'i dmigs 'jug bral //
K12D0828_H0792:115a-10: sems dpa' rdo rje legs par da bsgoms shig /
K12D0828_H0792:115a-11: dbang po yul la mi rtog sems mi sdud //
K12D0828_H0792:115a-12: gnyen po mi brten lus sems rgyud ma sbyongs //
K12D0828_H0792:115a-13: lus sems ma bcos snying po'i don du rtogs //
K12D0828_H0792:115a-15: kun byed rgyal po nga yi spyod pa ni //
K12D0828_H0792:115a-16: ma btsal lhug par gnas pas don kun rdzogs //
K12D0828_H0792:115a-17: snying po'i don du 'dus pas blang dor med //
K12D0828_H0792:115a-18: re dogs rnam par chad pas mya ngan 'das mi sgom //
K12D0828_H0792:115a-19: kun byed nga yi spyod pa gang rtogs pas //
K12D0828_H0792:115a-20: dus gsum skye med don du mnyam pa la //
K12D0828_H0792:115a-21: 'jug dang mi 'jug tshig las shin tu 'das //
K12D0828_H0792:115a-22: 'di ni blang dor med par lung bstan to //
K12D0828_H0792:115a-24: byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
K12D0828_H0792:115a-25: mnyam pa la blang dor med par bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun cu brgyad pa'o ////
K12D0828_H0792:115a-26: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos
K12D0828_H0792:115a-27: rang 'byung snying po'i ngang la sgrib pa bsal du
K12D0828_H0792:115b-0: med pa'i dgongs pa 'di gsungs @115b so; ;kye ston
K12D0828_H0792:115b-1: pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis //
K12D0828_H0792:115b-2: snying po sgrib med dgongs par lung bstan pa //
K12D0828_H0792:115b-3: ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams ma lus pa //
K12D0828_H0792:115b-4: skye med chos kyi dbyings su kun gcig pas //
K12D0828_H0792:115b-5: skye med snying po thugs kyi rang bzhin la //
K12D0828_H0792:115b-6: sgrib pa mi sgrib khyad par bstan pa med //
K12D0828_H0792:115b-8: sems dpa' rdo rje legs par nga sgoms shig /
K12D0828_H0792:115b-9: skye med chos kyi dbyings su gcig pa la //
K12D0828_H0792:115b-10: sgrib dang mi sgrib spong len gang 'dod pa //
K12D0828_H0792:115b-11: dam pa'i snying po'i don dang 'gal bar 'gyur //
K12D0828_H0792:115b-12: kun byed byang chub sems kyis lung bstan pa //
K12D0828_H0792:115b-13: skye med bsgoms pas skye ba snying por gsal //
K12D0828_H0792:115b-14: mkha' ltar rtog dpyod 'das la gang gnas pas //
K12D0828_H0792:115b-15: sgrib dang mi sgrib byang chub sems su gnas //
K12D0828_H0792:115b-17: kun byed rgyal pos 'khor la lung bstan pa //
K12D0828_H0792:115b-18: ye shes sgrib med gsal ba'i don du bstan //
K12D0828_H0792:115b-19: rang 'byung rgyu rkyen med pa'i snying por gnas //
K12D0828_H0792:115b-20: rtogs pas sgro skur 'das pa'i dgongs pa yin //
K12D0828_H0792:115b-22: de phyir sems dpa' rdo rje da sgoms shig /
K12D0828_H0792:115b-23: rang 'byung ye shes dmigs pa kun las 'das //
K12D0828_H0792:115b-24: rtogs pa dmigs pa'i don du gzhog mi byed //
K12D0828_H0792:115b-25: yul las 'das pas rnam shes srung mi byed //
K12D0828_H0792:115b-26: dngos po snying por gsal bas sgom mi byed //
K12D0828_H0792:115b-27: rnam pa snying por gsal bas re dogs med //
K12D0828_H0792:115b-29: ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis //
K12D0828_H0792:116a-1: 'khor gyi nang du lung bstan pa //
K12D0828_H0792:116a-2: ma bcos snying po ches kun rtsol ba la //
K12D0828_H0792:116a-3: ji ltar snang ba gtan la 'bebs par byed //
K12D0828_H0792:116a-4: snying po rang bzhin gcig gi don rtogs na //
K12D0828_H0792:116a-5: kun gyi rang bzhin kun byed nyid du 'dus //
K12D0828_H0792:116a-6: des na kun byed nga yi don mkhas na //
K12D0828_H0792:116a-7: bsam gyis mi khyab chos la mkhas par 'gyur //
K12D0828_H0792:116a-8: kun byed nga yi don la goms gyur na //
K12D0828_H0792:116a-9: kun gyi don la gnas shing goms pa yin //
K12D0828_H0792:116a-11: sems dpa' rdo rje legs par da sgoms shig /
K12D0828_H0792:116a-12: ji ltar snang grags chos rnams thams cad la //
K12D0828_H0792:116a-13: snying po rtogs goms don nyid gcig las med //
K12D0828_H0792:116a-14: snying po mngon du phyung nas gang bstan pa //
K12D0828_H0792:116a-15: rang bzhin skye ba med pa'i don du rtogs //
K12D0828_H0792:116a-16: ma yengs re dogs chad pas dgongs pa yin; ;kye /
K12D0828_H0792:116a-17: sems dpa' rdo rje legs par da sgoms shig /
K12D0828_H0792:116a-18: ji ltar snang ba'i chos su gang bstan pa //
K12D0828_H0792:116a-19: kun byed rgyal po mtshon pa'i thabs su bstan //
K12D0828_H0792:116a-20: thabs de'i lung dang 'gal bar ma byed cig /
K12D0828_H0792:116a-21: kun byed nga yi sras su zhugs rnams kyis //
K12D0828_H0792:116a-22: kun kyang skye med don du rtogs 'gyur na //
K12D0828_H0792:116a-23: 'khor dang mya ngan 'das par mi sems te //
K12D0828_H0792:116a-24: snying po rang bzhin rtogs dpyod bral bar bstan //
K12D0828_H0792:116a-26: byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
K12D0828_H0792:116a-27: mi sgrib pa'i le'u ste bdun cu dgu pa'o ////
K12D0828_H0792:116b-0: @116b de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal
K12D0828_H0792:116b-1: pos lhun grub re dogs las 'das pa'i dgongs pa
K12D0828_H0792:116b-3: sems dpa' rdo rje legs par da sgoms shig /
K12D0828_H0792:116b-4: da ni ston pa kun byed rgyal po ste //
K12D0828_H0792:116b-5: ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams ma lus pa //
K12D0828_H0792:116b-6: skye med sems kyi rang bzhin nyid du bstan //
K12D0828_H0792:116b-8: sems kyi rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i phyir //
K12D0828_H0792:116b-9: grub dang ma grub gnyis su lung mi ston //
K12D0828_H0792:116b-10: bde dang sdug bsngal gnyis su rtog mi byed //
K12D0828_H0792:116b-11: 'khor dang mya ngan 'das par re dogs bral //
K12D0828_H0792:116b-12: lhun grub sems kyi rang bzhin cir snang bas //
K12D0828_H0792:116b-13: ma byung stong pa'i don du smra ma byed //
K12D0828_H0792:116b-14: gzhi rtsa snying po rtog dpyod las 'das pas //
K12D0828_H0792:116b-15: grub cing brtan pa'i phyogs su zhen mi byed //
K12D0828_H0792:116b-17: sems dpa' rdo rje legs par da sgoms shig /
K12D0828_H0792:116b-18: lhun grub rtog dpyod 'das pa'i snying po la //
K12D0828_H0792:116b-19: grub dang ma grub don la rtog mi byed //
K12D0828_H0792:116b-20: de phyir khyod kyang rtog par ma byed cig /
K12D0828_H0792:116b-22: lhun grub bya rtsol 'das pa'i snying po la //
K12D0828_H0792:116b-23: gang gi phyogs ldog med pa'i zhen pa ni //
K12D0828_H0792:116b-24: ji ltar bus pa mkha' la rtsod pa ltar //
K12D0828_H0792:116b-25: kun byed nga yi rang bzhin mthong mi 'gyur //
K12D0828_H0792:116b-26: gang gis gang spangs ldog par 'dod pa ni //
K12D0828_H0792:116b-27: re dogs 'jigs pa'i sems dang ma bral bas //
K12D0828_H0792:116b-28: mtha' bral mtha' la zhen pa'i gang zag gis //
K12D0828_H0792:116b-29: lhun grub snying po'i don la ji ltar reg /
K12D0828_H0792:117a-0: sems dpa' rdo rje legs par da sgoms @117a *//
K12D0828_H0792:117a-2: ma skyes rnam par dag pa'i don snang bas //
K12D0828_H0792:117a-3: snang ba dngos por mi lta 'jig mi byed //
K12D0828_H0792:117a-4: snang ba skye ba med par rang grol bas //
K12D0828_H0792:117a-5: stong pa mi sgom ji bzhin rtogs pas grol //
K12D0828_H0792:117a-7: ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po ngas //
K12D0828_H0792:117a-8: ji ltar snang ba'i chos ni thams cad kun //
K12D0828_H0792:117a-9: ma skyes rnam par dag par lung bstan pas //
K12D0828_H0792:117a-10: ji ltar skye ba med pa nyid du rtogs //
K12D0828_H0792:117a-12: nga las byung ba ston pa sku gsum la //
K12D0828_H0792:117a-13: sems nyid skye ba med par kun smra zhing //
K12D0828_H0792:117a-14: rang bzhin med pa'i don la kun rtsod kyang //
K12D0828_H0792:117a-15: skye med mngon sum dus kyis rtogs pa med //
K12D0828_H0792:117a-16: de phyir kun byed rgyal po'i lung 'di la //
K12D0828_H0792:117a-17: shes nas ma yengs don la gnas pa las //
K12D0828_H0792:117a-18: rtsol bas mi 'jug gnyen pos sems mi sbyongs //
K12D0828_H0792:117a-19: yul la mi 'jog dran pa'i sems mi sdud //
K12D0828_H0792:117a-20: gang ltar 'byung ba de nyid don yin pas //
K12D0828_H0792:117a-21: kun byed nga yi don la 'jug par gyis //
K12D0828_H0792:117a-23: ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis //
K12D0828_H0792:117a-24: ma bcos sems kyi 'khor la lung phog pa //
K12D0828_H0792:117a-25: ma lus skye med rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa //
K12D0828_H0792:117a-26: rang bzhin bcu las rtsol bar ma byed cig /
K12D0828_H0792:117a-27: kun byed byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin la //
K12D0828_H0792:117a-28: shes pas gzung 'dzin mi shes spang med pas //
K12D0828_H0792:117a-29: rtogs pa dbang bsgyur don la gnas pa yis //
K12D0828_H0792:117b-0: kun byed rgyal po'i dgongs @117b pa lhun gyis grub /
K12D0828_H0792:117b-2: byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
K12D0828_H0792:117b-3: lhun grub re dogs bcad pa'i le'u ste brgyad cu pa'o ////
K12D0828_H0792:117b-4: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po
K12D0828_H0792:117b-5: la sems dpa' rdo rjes 'di skad ces zhus so
K12D0828_H0792:117b-7: ston pa kun byed rgyal po lags /
K12D0828_H0792:117b-8: ji ltar snang ba'i chos ni khyod kyis byas //
K12D0828_H0792:117b-9: bstan pa'i dam chos ma lus khyod kyis bkod //
K12D0828_H0792:117b-10: dam pa'i rang bzhin khyod kyis bstan pas na //
K12D0828_H0792:117b-11: khyod kyi rang bzhin rtogs na chos kun rtogs //
K12D0828_H0792:117b-12: de bas chos kun nyid kyi rang bzhin 'di //
K12D0828_H0792:117b-13: 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis gsal bar ma rig pas //
K12D0828_H0792:117b-14: don du ji ltar gnas pa bshad du gsol /
K12D0828_H0792:117b-16: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos mdo lung rgyud la bsdu ba 'di gsungs so //
K12D0828_H0792:117b-17: kye; sems dpa' rdo rje legs par nan tan gyis //
K12D0828_H0792:117b-18: ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis //
K12D0828_H0792:117b-19: 'khor la mdo lung bsdus pa 'di phog pa //
K12D0828_H0792:117b-20: legs par bstan pa'i don la nan tan gyis //
K12D0828_H0792:117b-22: nga yi rang bzhin skye med don gcig la //
K12D0828_H0792:117b-23: rgyud kyi rang bzhin rnam pa gsum du bstan //
K12D0828_H0792:117b-24: gdams pa rnam pa gsum gyi rim pa yis //
K12D0828_H0792:117b-25: rgyud ni rtsa ba'i rgyud dang phyi ma dang; ;phyi ma'i phyi mas don rdzogs bstan pa yin //
K12D0828_H0792:117b-27: rtsa ba thos pa'i rang bzhin bstan pa ni //
K12D0828_H0792:117b-28: nga yi rang bzhin lnga bcu rtsa bdun gyis //
K12D0828_H0792:118a-0: dngos po'i don kun gtan la phab @118a *//
K12D0828_H0792:118a-2: sems dpa' rdo rjes legs par nan tan gyis //
K12D0828_H0792:118a-4: nga yi rang bzhin lnga bcu rtsa bdun ni //
K12D0828_H0792:118a-5: mngon du phyung ba'i mdo lung bcu po dang //
K12D0828_H0792:118a-6: nges par bstan pa'i mad lung bcu po dang //
K12D0828_H0792:118a-7: rgyu 'bras 'das pa'i mdo lung bcu po dang //
K12D0828_H0792:118a-8: bya med rdzogs pa'i mdo lung bcu po dang //
K12D0828_H0792:118a-9: gtan la 'bebs pa'i mdo lung bcu dag dang //
K12D0828_H0792:118a-10: dgos ched so sor bstan pas lnga bcu lnga //
K12D0828_H0792:118a-11: gcig gis gzhi bstan gcig gis gdams pa bstan //
K12D0828_H0792:118a-13: ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis //
K12D0828_H0792:118a-14: mngon du phyung ba'i mdo lung bcu bstan pa //
K12D0828_H0792:118a-15: dang po dang ni bcu dang gnyis bstan pa //
K12D0828_H0792:118a-16: bcu gcig pa dang gsum dang nyi shu pa //
K12D0828_H0792:118a-17: bco lnga pa dang nyi shu lnga pa dang //
K12D0828_H0792:118a-18: nyi shu rtsa gcig drug pas rdzogs pa yin //
K12D0828_H0792:118a-19: gdams ngag phog pas mngon phyung mthong ba'i phyir //
K12D0828_H0792:118a-20: bcu drug pa yis mngon phyung dgos pa bstan //
K12D0828_H0792:118a-22: ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis //
K12D0828_H0792:118a-23: nges par bstan pa'i mdo lung bcu bstan pa //
K12D0828_H0792:118a-24: bzhi pa sum cu gsum pa bcu gsum pa //
K12D0828_H0792:118a-25: bcu gnyis pa dang lnga dang sum cu gnyis //
K12D0828_H0792:118a-26: sum cu drug dang sum cu bzhi pa dang //
K12D0828_H0792:118a-27: nyi shu dgu dang bcu bdun pa yis rdzogs //
K12D0828_H0792:118a-28: nges par bstan pa'i dgos pa yid ches dag /
K12D0828_H0792:118a-29: lnga bcu rtsa lnga pa yis bstan pa yin //
K12D0828_H0792:118a-31: ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis //
K12D0828_H0792:118b-0: rgyu 'bras 'das pa'i mdo @118b lung bcu bstan pa //
K12D0828_H0792:118b-1: bzhi bcu gcig pa bcu bzhi sum cu brgyad //
K12D0828_H0792:118b-2: dgu pa dang ni so lnga bcu dgu pa //
K12D0828_H0792:118b-3: bco brgyad pa dang brgyad dang bzhi bcu dang //
K12D0828_H0792:118b-4: lnga bcu rtsa gnyis pa yis bstan pa yin //
K12D0828_H0792:118b-5: rgyu 'bras 'das pas rtsol bsgrub bya mi dgos //
K12D0828_H0792:118b-6: bdun pa nyid du nges par bstan pa yin //
K12D0828_H0792:118b-8: ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis //
K12D0828_H0792:118b-9: bya med rdzogs pa'i lung bcu bstan pa ni //
K12D0828_H0792:118b-10: nyi shu gnyis dang sum cu pa dag dang //
K12D0828_H0792:118b-11: nyi shu bzhi dang nyer brgyad nyi shu bdun //
K12D0828_H0792:118b-12: sum cu gcig dang nyer gsum nyi shu drug /
K12D0828_H0792:118b-13: zhe bzhi lnga bcu drug pas bstan pa yin //
K12D0828_H0792:118b-14: ma byas rang bzhin rdzogs par bstan pa'i phyir //
K12D0828_H0792:118b-15: bzhi bcu gsum pas de yi dgos pa bstan //
K12D0828_H0792:118b-17: ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis //
K12D0828_H0792:118b-18: gtan la 'bebs pa'i lung bcu bstan pa ni //
K12D0828_H0792:118b-19: nyer brgyad pa dang sum cu dgu pa dang //
K12D0828_H0792:118b-20: bzhi bcu lnga dang so bdun zhe drug pa //
K12D0828_H0792:118b-21: zhe bdun pa dang zhe dgu nga gcig pa //
K12D0828_H0792:118b-22: lnga bcu pa dang lnga bcu gsum pas rdzogs //
K12D0828_H0792:118b-23: gtan la phebs na ma bcos bcos med pas //
